title: Exceptional 2 Bedroom Maisonette Rooftop Views
description: Exceptional in every way. This stunning and bright maisonette apartment on the 16th floor cannot be beaten with its view, hand picked designer interior combined with collectors items and vintage furniture decorated with love to detail but in a very modern and contemporary art of living. A total of five rooms including two bedrooms with walking closet, a salon, a dining room with open plan kitchen, office/guest room and two bathrooms- one with a rain shower and the second with a bath tub. All in in one- very exquisite. In the heart of one of Berlin-Mitte's most pulsating areas around Alexanderplatz. The property is located in one of the most attractive, convenient and sought-after parts of downtown Berlin. Everything from the Central Station to the Museum Island, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within minutes within walking distance. Many nice shops, cafes, clubs, restaurants are in the area, famous Hackescher Markt, Berlin Cathedral and Unter den Linden are just around the corner. S-Bahn Alexanderplatz, U-Bahn Weinmeisterstrasse and diverse busses and trams are all in walking distance. You can't live more central.  800 Euro monthly serious tenants only!

title: STUDIO fOR rENT iN cOLIVING sTUDENT bUILDING iN mITTE
description: The small and simple studio in Mitte  Because you're a student, and you want to live in a private studio with all the social benefits of a cool urban-living space – in one of Berlin’s most central neighbourhoods.  What's so cool about coliving?...  Coliving is a new concept in renting. Rather than live alone, you rent in a building with like-minded peers. It’s a bit like living in a student hall of residence because you share social spaces with your peers. But unlike a hall of residence, coliving spaces work to create happy individuals and healthy communities.  Living here, you’ll get to meet people from all over the world. People with different stories, original perspectives, and shared values. You'll make friends, learn surprising lessons, and love the experience. Plus you get everything you need in one place More Information: homespace.website/ezud-nopromoted

title: 43mq new and cosy Flat in Rummelsburg / Lichtenberg Berlin
description: Hey!   (German text below)  We are renting a fresh flat in Berlin Lichtenberg (10317), in a building, constructed in 2019 in Luckstr.  Flat:   The flat is 43mq, has 2 rooms (a bedroom and a joint living room with a kitchen), a balcony, an underfloor heating and will be furnished. It is on the 1st floor and is directed to the east side with big windows and therefore is very bright. The flat will have an equipped kitchen and all the basic electric devices.  Rent:  The rent is 1100 Euros, including all the taxes (‘warm’), and the electricity costs. The deposit is 2000 Euros.  The rent is for 1 year with the option to extend it.  Location:   Lichtenberg is an upcoming neighborhood, easily reached by the S-Bahn (one station from Ostkreuz) and other means of transportation. The wonderful area of Rummelsburg and the Spree is close by, as well as the old and charming part of Lichtenberg, which is a pleasure to discover.  There is a supermarket next door as well.  Whom are we looking for:   We are looking for a couple or a single person to live there. The flat is a family investment, we are not a big company and we live abroad, therefore a normal humane communication and your responsiveness would be highly appreciated. If you think you can love and respect the place as your own home, we are glad to hear more from you.   Best Hi!   Wir vermieten eine ganz neue Wohnung in Berlin Lichtenberg (10317), in einem Gebäude vom 2019 in Lückstr.  Die Wohnung:   Die Wohnung ist 43qm groß, hat 2 Zimmer (ein Schlafzimmer und ein Wohnzimmer mit der Küche zusammen), ein Balkon, Fußbodenheizung und wird möbliert vermietet. Die Wohnung befindet sich auf der 1 Etage, die grosse Fenster sind alle auf der Ostseite und die Wohnung ist deswegen sehr hell. Die Wohnung wird möbliert vermietet und hat eine Einbauküche.   Die Miete:  Die Warmmiete (inklusive Stromkosten) beträgt 1100 Euro, die Kaution ist 2000 Euro.  Der Mietdauer ist 1 Jahr mit der Moglichkeit dies zu verlängern.  Die Lage:   Lichtenberg ist ein beliebtes Kiez, was mit der S-Bahn (nur eine Station vom Ostkreuz) und anderen Öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln einfach zu erreichen ist. In der Nähe liegt die magische Gegend von Rummelsburg und die Spree, sowie der alte und charmante Teil des Lichtenbergs.  Ein Supermarkt ist auch um die Ecke.  Wen suchen wir:   Wir suchen nach ein Paar oder eine Person. Das ist eine Familien-Investition, wir sind kein großes Unternehmen, daher würden wir eine menschliche, aufrichtige und transparente kommunikation schätzen. Wenn Sie denken, dass Sie diesen Ort lieben und wie Ihr eigenes Zuhause respektieren können, wir würden uns auf Ihre Nachricht freuen.   Lg

title: COSY & LAVISHLY EQUIPPED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT

The apartment is located in a charming, quiet side street, just around the corner from lively Torstr. Located in famous gallery street Auguststr., just a few steps to Museum Island and Friedrichstr. You can't be more central: Next stations Oranienburger Tor and Oranienburger Str. (both in 100m from the apartment).

title: Bright and Modern 2 Bedroom Apartment

Enjoy the spacious terrace which you can access from the living area and which is shared with the fully equipped open plan kitchen. The modern kitchen has modern appliances all the way through including an induction stove, oven, coffee machine, kettle and a large refrigerator. The large, wooden dining table can seat up to six persons. The cozy designed lounge area invites to relax or watch movies on the smart TV flat screen. The bedroom offers a large cupboard with mirrors and a comfortable king and queen size bed for a peaceful sleep. The bathroom has a walk-in rain shower, a big square washing basin and a washing machine.  The property is located in one of the most desirable residential and sought-after parts in the center of Berlin - in Mitte. The gallery district, independent designers, Natural History Museum and the business district are within spitting distance. From here all of the highlights of the city are easily reached - from Central Station (only three tram stations away) to Museum Island, Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within walking distance or public transport.  800 monthly all utilities and bills inclusive contact for viewing.

A total of five rooms including two bedrooms with walking closet, a salon, a dining room with open plan kitchen, office/guest room and two bathrooms- one with a rain shower and the second with a bath tub. All in in one- very exquisite. In the heart of one of Berlin-Mitte's most pulsating areas around Alexanderplatz. The property is located in one of the most attractive, convenient and sought-after parts of downtown Berlin. Everything from the Central Station to the Museum Island, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within minutes within walking distance. Many nice shops, cafes, clubs, restaurants are in the area, famous Hackescher Markt, Berlin Cathedral and Unter den Linden are just around the corner. title: Home Away From Home Neatly Furnished Apartment
description: In our lovingly newly furnished and fully equipped apartment you sleep comfortably in high quality box spring beds. Centrally located, it offers the ideal base for your stay in Berlin. Cleanliness and hygiene are very important to us. In just a few stops you can reach the most famous sights such. The Messe Berlin, the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag, Checkpoint Charlie / Friedrichstrasse, the Eastside Gallery, the KaDeWe, the Kurfürstendamm ...  The 110 m² apartment consists of 4 bedrooms, 2 shower bathrooms and kitchen with inviting dining area / living area and HD TV with international HD channels on 50 "flat screen. WLAN / Wifi is available free of charge.  The building was completed in 2017 according to the latest standards and has u. a. via an elevator and large balcony to the quiet courtyard. The apartment is located in 1. OG.  The bedrooms are equipped with high-quality King Size boxspring double beds and wardrobes. On request, we can make the two sofa beds for 2 persons and creche travel (60x120 cm) and children's high chairs available. Please contact us before you travel.  In the new bathrooms with shower, toilet and sink we provide our guests with towels, hair dryer, soap and shampoo.  The kitchen is fully equipped with large fridge & freezer, ceramic hob & oven, extractor hood, coffee maker, kettle, microwave, toaster, pots, pans, plates, cups, glasses, cutlery, dishwasher and a variety of little things and extras ...  The apartment offers the ideal starting point for your stay in Berlin. In just a few stops you can reach the most famous sights such. For example, the Charlottenburg Palace, the Brandenburg Gate, the Reichstag, Checkpoint Charlie / Friedrichstrasse, the Eastside Gallery, the Zoo Berlin, the KaDeWe, the Kurfürstendamm, the Messe Berlin ....  Numerous shops, supermarkets (also organic), bakery, pharmacy, restaurants, snack bar only 100 meters away.  A big Berlin wall map is for your orientation in the apartment. Smaller folding maps with markings of tourist attractions, U- & S-Bahn network and sights we provide for our guests to take along.

title: Affordable and Comfortable Grant Berlin apartment
description: This apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, fridge and oven, and an adjoining dining area. It is located in the main street at a busy intersection. This 6 bedroom property is ideal for families, school groups or groups of friends.  Up to 18 guests can be accommodated in the comfortable beds. 4 bathrooms with toilet and shower are ready. TV and WLAN are of course available.

title: Spacious and inexpensive apartment for your taste.
description: On the ground floor of a carefully preserved pre-war building lies this spacious apartment which consists of two separate units directly connected through a double door. In the back with its windows towards the courtyard, there are two bedrooms, one of which has its own private bathroom. Next to the other bedroom there is a second large bathroom with a tub and a washing machine. At the heart of the apartment though lies the so-called 'Berlin room' which traces the typical outline of that era's construction with a main building crossing over into a side wing. This room has been converted into large open kitchen with a dining table and two couch chairs which each unfold to comfortable single bed. Across the hall and separated by a double door lies the front part of the apartment with its windows toward the street. Here you find the master bedroom plus a living room with another sleeping couch, dining table and a third bathroom with a shower. There is also a small tea kitchen with an extra fridge. A glas door leads directly onto the tree lined side walk of this quiet street where you can sit on your own private bench and enjoy warm summer nights with the company of your local neighbors.  Features:  The large kitchen has a round table for up to 6 people and two sofa chairs that unfold to a single bed each (200 x 80 cm).  The kitchen is equipped with a sink, an electric stove, microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher and of course all the cooking utensils necessary to prepare a good meal.  Bedroom #2 has a double bed (140 x 200 cm) and a private bathroom with shower, hand basin and WC.  Bedroom #3 has two single beds (70 x 200 cm) which can be pushed together.  The large bathroom has a bathing tub, wash hand basin, a toilet and a washing machine.  The living room includes a small tea kitchen and has a table for 4 people and a cozy sitting area. The sofa can be pulled out and used as another double bed (120 x 200 cm).  The master bedroom has a double bed (160 x 200 cm), a large wardrobe, a desk and a sofa; the third bathroom a shower, wash hand basin and toilet.

title: Spacious and inexpensive apartment centrally located.
description: Spacious vacation apartment for 9 persons- central and with excellent public transport access day and night. This spacious holiday flat is situated in Berlin Mitte/Wedding and the ideal Berlin accommodation for families with several children or bigger groups since it caters for up to 9 people. The 110m² apartment is situated in a typical refurbished Wilhelminian style building with high ceilings with stucco. The flat consists of 2 bedrooms, 1 living room (TV set, radio/CD, DVD), with couch and armchairs and an open kitchen (oven, fridge, coffeemaker, toaster, kettle etc.) with a big dinner table, bathroom and an additional separate toilet. One smaller bedroom is equipped with a double bed, wardrobe and a chest of drawers, the big bedroom contains 5 single beds plus 3 spare beds, wardrobe and drawers. The big bathroom has a bathtub with shower device. Washing maschine and dryer are in a  sperate room.

title: Pappelallee apartment in Prenzlauer Berg with WiFi & balcony.
description: Step inside this comfy apartment, all ten of you and admire the space (yes! Room for ten). Head out to the balcony while the rest of your group runs around finding their favourite bed to sleep in. You made a good choice you think, as you sit out and relax.  It’s warm, modern and homely here. And there’s plenty to entertain them outside.  Prenzlauer Berg is a fashionable area north of Mitte. Interesting bars, bohemian cafés and kitsch boutiques dot its most frequented streets like Kastanienallee and Oderberger Straße. It doesn't have the edge that Kreuzberg has, but it's a great place to visit for its laid-back atmosphere.  To get a feel for the local area, head to the Mauerpark. This former border strip has a fleamarket on Sundays as well as spontaneous parties that last well into the night. The nearby Kulturbrauerei also offers frequent night time entertainment.

title: MODERN AND VERY STYLISH COMFORT APARTMENT.. MONTHLY RENTALS
description: Bright and Modern Apartment with a in a great location heart of Berlin. I'm assuring you your best stay in this Lovely apartment located in an up-and-coming neighborhood of Berlin. It has a wireless internet, a TV, and a DVD player. There is a big bathtub, a shower, and a washing machine in the bathroom. In the kitchen there is a new fridge and a stove. The living room area includes a brand new double sofa bed.  The apartment is located a few steps away from all the major transport systems: Hermann Str. title: Apartment 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 6 person
description: The building was in 2014 fully restored. An apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, ecologically refurbished and equipped with products leading manufacturers, walls made of clay, shielded cables, floating oak floor, baseboard heater. The means: spelled, kapok and latex pillows, latex mattresses and Tencel (Celulose) ceiling of Dormiente, towels, bedding and curtains made from organic cotton (KBA) of Cotonea, water revitalization of EWO, faucets by Grohe, frameless floor-level glass shower the top series Davita by Schulte , red Dot design shower head Raindance by Hansgrohe, washbasin Architec toilet and bidet and Stark 2 of Duravit, natural stone tiles of red travertine, underfloor heating in the bathroom area. It was carried out an investigation after the Baubiologische Standard of Building Biology metrology. Cleaning with gently dosed organic fabric softener, without fragrances.  The apartment is for a maximum of 8 adults

title: Cozy apartment in Kreuzberg with Terrace in the Quiet Courtyard
description: Kreuzberg is the vibrant heart of the capital, the ultimate melting pot for all things creative. Kreuzberg is always up to date and always full of life.  A flair of world music accompanies you through the countless bars, restaurants and pubs.  And in the middle is our small, cozy apartment in the yard.  There is a living area with kitchenette, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a terrace.  At the subway station Kottbusser Tor there are all important utilities like supermarkets, bank with ATM, drugstore and pharmacy. The small market offers daily fresh fruits and vegetables.

title: Exceptional 2 Bedroom Maisonette Rooftop Views
description: Exceptional in every way. This stunning and bright maisonette apartment on the 16th floor cannot be beaten with its view, hand picked designer interior combined with collectors items and vintage furniture decorated with love to detail but in a very modern and contemporary art of living. A total of five rooms including two bedrooms with walking closet, a salon, a dining room with open plan kitchen, office/guest room and two bathrooms- one with a rain shower and the second with a bath tub. All in in one- very exquisite. In the heart of one of Berlin-Mitte's most pulsating areas around Alexanderplatz. The property is located in one of the most attractive, convenient and sought-after parts of downtown Berlin. Everything from the Central Station to the Museum Island, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within minutes within walking distance. Many nice shops, cafes, clubs, restaurants are in the area, famous Hackescher Markt, Berlin Cathedral and Unter den Linden are just around the corner. S-Bahn Alexanderplatz, U-Bahn Weinmeisterstrasse and diverse busses and trams are all in walking distance. You can't live more central.  800 Euro monthly serious tenants only!

title: COSY & LAVISHLY EQUIPPED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT
description: Located on the 2nd floor with elevator, this apartment overlooks a quiet street. It sleeps 2 people.  The main room overlooks the street (double glazed windows) and is very bright thanks to a large glass door which gives access to a small balcony.  Hard wood floor. The room consists of a double bed (140 * 190), an armchair, a coffee table, a TV (cabled) and a library. Wifi and DSL internet connection at your disposal.  The kitchen is open to the main room that can be closed with sliding shutters. It is equipped with 4 gas burners, refrigerator with freezer, an oven, a microwave, a dish washer, a toaster and an electric kettle.  You have at your disposal all necessary dishes. For your meals, you will have a bar table with 2 bar chairs.  The bathroom has a shower, a toilet, washbasin with mirror, a washing machine and a dryer.  At disposal a large closet in the entrance.  For your convenience towels and linens are provided.  Central heating.  Price per month : 600€ Utilities included except electricity and gas Minimum stay : 3 Months  Maximum stay : 24 Months Security deposit : Between one and two months Agency fees: No agency fee, private listing.  ***BEING A PRIVATE LISTING, I ASK YOU TO PLEASE WRITE YOUR EMAIL WHEN REPLYING***

title: +++APARTMENT NEAR CHECKPOINT CHARLIE IN MITTE+++
description: Cozy, bright, comfortable. 5th Floor - Bathroom + WC, fridge, microwave, W- Lan Internet (Wi-Fi), TV, DVD  This area hosts a nice selection of contemporary art galleries and small fashion shops. There are nice coffee shops, small independent clothing stores, shopping, restaurants, museums, bars, and nightlife all at your doorstep. Tourist attractions such as Checkpoint Charlie, Berlin Wall Museum, Museum Island, Hackesche Höfe, TV Tower, Reichstag, Brandenburger Tür, Potsdamer Platz, etc. All accessible by foot, or short journey with public transport - U-Bahn or Tram. Please be aware that the apartment is in right in the center of a happening part of Berlin, Mitte and close to Bars and restaurants in the Novalisstr. and Tor Strasse - including a bar downstairs, and therefore the one disadvantage is that it is not completely quiet, as is the case in the center of any large city. This small, but cozy place is an ideal spot to spend a week in the heart of Berlin.

title: I am moving abroad and looking for somebody to take over my rental con
description: I am moving abroad and looking for somebody to take over my rental contract and furniture for a great 1 bedroom apartment near Bergmannkiez in Kreuzberg. Its a really good location - a 5 minute walk from Hallesches Tor U-Bahn, 10 minutes walk from Bergmannkiez (a super nice area for cafes, restaurants, markets, shops, & bars), and right next to the Landwehr Canal (a great place to hang out in the summer). The abandoned airport - Tempelhofer Feld - is also about a 20minute run away and a great place to jog, cycle, kite landboard or whatever you're into. The apartment has a nice little balony where you can enjoy a meal or drinks in the summer.  The apartment is 37.43 square meters and has the following rooms: A small hallway A kitchen A bathroom A bedroom / living space  I am looking for someone to take as much of the furniture (bed, dining table & chairs, sofa, coffee table, book shelf etc), fittings (curtain rails, lights, coat rack), and electrical items (toaster, iron, kettle, fan etc) as possible. It is all relatively new (1 year max) and in very good condition. A reasonable financial offer for these would be very welcome but I'm happy to give many things away for free. All kitchen fittings and large applicances (oven, washing machine, & fridge-freezer) and all bathroom items are included with the apartment. There is an existing 50mb/s Wi-Fi Internet contract with O2 which is roughly €30 per month until 22.02.2021 - it would help me out if you can take that over and it will save you the hassle of getting a new router etc (it took them 2 months to deliver and install mine originally).  The warm rent is €725 per month. A deposit of €1890 will need to be paid directly to the letting agent. You would need to start the rental contract from 01.03.2020 and it will run until at least 31.07.2020. You can talk directly with the letting agent about the length of contract you desire.  The letting agent requires the following documents: - Mieterselbstauskunft - letter from previous landlord confirming no rental debts - last 3 payslips as proof of income (or a copy of contract stating salary) - healthy credit statement (SCHUFA)  Note also that your salary must be at least 3x times the rental amount.  As I am leaving Berlin on February 28th and the letting agent will take time to vet your documents, we need to move quickly! We can arrange for you to view the apartment this week and if all is good I can recommend you to the letting agent as soon as possible.

description: Really? Tell me more...  You will love open-plan living. From the cosy sleeping area to the fully-equipped kitchen, everything is within arm's reach. Have a paper due soon? title: Completely new furnished studio apartment
description: Nicely furnished, newly renovated 80m, one bedroom apt.on the 2nd floor(with lift) in the City Centre. The area is the Jordaan.It is very bright, and spacious, and has a front view of the Westerkerk, and back view of gardens. Situated between Amsterdams two main canals,it is two blocks from the Anne Frank House. We have one flat screen tv, WI-FI and a copier/printer. There is also a washing machine, and dryer. The bathroom has a tub, and there is a separate toilet. There is a wood burning fireplace, and wooden floors throughout the apartment. The kitchen has new appliances and a dishwasher. There is also a washer and dryer.A long hallway separates the bedroom and living room. Both rooms have doors so there is lots of privacy, the apartment is very comfortable.The street has a supermarket, and several cafes. There are three tram lines, and several buses in front of the door. It is a wonderfully convenient area in the heart of the historic district. It is a great apartment for someone doing business in Berlin or for tourists who want to be in the center. The tram in front of the house goes to Central Station, and it is a twenty minute ride to the airport.

title: Gorgeous Sublet 1 bed/1 person march-Oct or more!
description: LOOKING FOR A SPECIAL SUBLET PERSON / I am offering the sublet  6 months to one year BUT YOU MUST READ WHOLE THING TO EXPLAIN !!  I am SUBLETTING  my space from february (or march) - sept or ONE YEAR. with the possibility i may give the lease over the person/not sure…   I am in a very tricky situation in my life. I love my Berlin life… I do not want to leave and hopefully I can  save my space finding a GOOD, TRUSTING, DECENT QUIET FEMALE but right now, I have a family health emergency and i have to be  away several months, maybe even a year… and i need someone  who will FIT IN here, hopefully speak german, and not bring too much attention to the fact i have to be away.  Someone who doesnt’ have furniture and someone who doesn’t have an issue with SHARING the space if i need to come back !!  570 a month for a one bedroom, huge 72 qm space in Wedding near SEE STRASSE UBAHN, centrally located.  small bathroom with shower, huge kitchen, and huge living room. There are 2 balconies.  You hear the birds in the morning, and if you want to start a garden on the balcony the landlord would love you!  The person who comes in here has to be easy to communicate with, respectful  of other people, CONSCIOUS, aware, and awake please and WORKING!!  This building is OLD SCHOOL, i.e. people live here for over 20 years, they don’t care as long as there is quiet, and respect for each other’s lives, so no coming in at 3 am, slamming doors etc.   Someone who enjoys the space as a sanctuary to home to, to write, but  no parties. There are so many amazing YOGA spaces round here.  There are green parks here and wonderful walking and Plotzensee is down the road.  This area is NOT highly gentrified and still has a cool  old school german vibe to it.  Speaking German would help not req  So the ROOMMATE situation occurs maybe in jUNE / JULY when i have to come back for a few days or weeks.  I am not sure.  Because of the HEALTH issue I have to go day by day with my family situation!!  I DO NOT KNOW.  You could end up having the space for one year for yourself… but i know i have to come back june or july just to show myself…. so for a few days. So,this means you will only share for a few weeks!!   I’m a quiet, gay writer, and i would live in the living room, again this is very easy, i usually work nIGHTS, so it would help for the person to work 9-5 so each would have the space to themselves…. the rent would go down to 380 a month…   I’m an older, but still funky dude girl writer!  I like my space to think and write, but I’m also super social and would love to share this space with a curious, but NO DRAMA person who likes her space too, but also likes to hang out with a coffee and chat  here and there…..  Please email me a bit about yourself… i’ll email photos!! PLEASE PLEASE GET IN TOUCH RIGHT AWAY  thanks and blessings and lets believe in miracles.. cause i sure need one now!

title: Rühig an den Mauerweg wohnen / Quiet place right on the Mauerweg
description: I (48-yo male) am subletting a 20 sq.m. room in a fully-equipped apartment in Neukölln from now through June 2020. The neighborhood is Köllnische Heide (with its own S-Bahn, roughly half-way between the Neukölln and Baumschulenweg S-Bahn stops).  The room is equipped with a king-sized bed, clothing cabinets, shelves, a recliner chair with footrest and a large corner desk and office chair. It's southwest facing and attaches to an open 3 sq.m. balcony via a glass door. All the windows and the balcony door have full Persian blinds. Please see the attached diagram for the full layout.  The charge of 450 EUR includes everything except Internet; there is the option to share with the neighbors for 15 EUR monthly.  The neighborhood offers the Mauerweg bike/jogging path (one-minute walk), lots of beautiful greenery, peace and quiet, and fresh air. Close to the M41 bus (350 meters) which covers the Sonnenallee corridor up to Hermannplatz and continues on through Kreuzberg to Potsdamer Platz and Hauptbahnhof. The Köllnische Heide S-Bahn is 750 meters away, which is easy to get to but far eough away not to be heard in the flat.  I use the 13 sq. m. room in the diagram (attached). There is a small 8 m2 dining room with an antique wooden dining table and chairs. The kitchen is fully equipped, including a clothes washer. The bathroom has a full tub with shower. Hot water is delivered via an electric on-demand water heater. Radiators provide room heating.  There is also the possibility of extending this agreement and/or taking over the lease yourself after my departure. I am preparing to leave Berlin within the year.  Please note that the legal owner (my landlord) will provide you with the paperwork necessary to legally register the flat as your residence in Berlin and that any agreement for extending the lease would be negotiated with her.  No smokers or party animals.

title: Amazing studio apartment from Apr 2nd - 11th
description: A very cozy 52 square meter / 2 room apartment in a quiet courtyard. Wood floors, high ceilings, great light, many new furnishings including a new washing machine, all linens provided. And contemporary art all around (inside the apartment and all around Berlin :-)  Very close to Wasserturmpark, Kollwitzplatz, many cafes and the M2 tram right outside the door (6 minute ride to Alexanderplatz).  This is my own home rented out for times that I must travel, which is coming up between Apr 2nd - 11th (9 nights). Total price: 400 Euros.

title: COSY & LAVISHLY EQUIPPED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT
description: Located on the 2nd floor with elevator, this apartment overlooks a quiet street. It sleeps 2 people.  The main room overlooks the street (double glazed windows) and is very bright thanks to a large glass door which gives access to a small balcony.  Hard wood floor. The room consists of a double bed (140 * 190), an armchair, a coffee table, a TV (cabled) and a library. Wifi and DSL internet connection at your disposal.  The kitchen is open to the main room that can be closed with sliding shutters. It is equipped with 4 gas burners, refrigerator with freezer, an oven, a microwave, a dish washer, a toaster and an electric kettle.  You have at your disposal all necessary dishes. For your meals, you will have a bar table with 2 bar chairs.  The bathroom has a shower, a toilet, washbasin with mirror, a washing machine and a dryer.  At disposal a large closet in the entrance.  For your convenience towels and linens are provided.  Central heating.  Price per month : 600€ Utilities included except electricity and gas Minimum stay : 3 Months  Maximum stay : 24 Months Security deposit : Between one and two months Agency fees: No agency fee, private listing.  ***BEING A PRIVATE LISTING, I ASK YOU TO PLEASE WRITE YOUR EMAIL WHEN REPLYING***

title: Room for sublet (march)
description: We sublet a big quiet room of our flat in Neukölln between 01.03.2020 and end of march (also possible until begin of april, around 03.04.2020). Nearby there are parks, the canal and the river and also a little forest. It is also not far away from Sonnenallee and Weserstrasse and all the nice bars and cafes. There is a bus station directly at the house and in a short walk you can reach S- and U-Bahn-station. So the flat´s location is in a perfect balance of city and green areas.  In the flat live two people and we have cats. We make our own flat whites with our espresso machine and we make fermentation drinks like kefir and kombucha you can also watch and learn during your stay if you want.  The rent for one month is 600 Euro.  We look forward to your messages.     wir vermieten ein großes ruhiges Zimmer (24 sq.ft.)meiner 2-Zimmer-Wohnung (65 sq.ft.) in Neukölln nahe der Sonnenallee/Weserstrasse im Zeitraum Anfang bis Ende Februar (flexibles Ein- bzw.- Auszugsdatum). Die Wohnung hat abgezogene Dielen und wurde vor einigen Jahren komplett saniert. Es gibt in der näheren Umgebung alles was im Alltag bzw. zum Ausgehen wichtig ist. Diverse verschiedene Supermärkte sind fussläufig zu erreichen. Restaurants, Cafes, Bars und Clubs, Sonnenallee, Weserstrasse und Rathaus Neukölln sind alle easy zu Fuss oder mit Rad in einigen Minuten zu erreichen. Die Gegend ist sehr attraktiv und auch grün. In der Nähe gibt es viel Wasser (Kanal, Fluss), Wald (Plänterwald) sowie ein schöner großer Park (Treptower Park) und viele Kleingärtenanlagen  Das Zimmer ist vom 01.03.2020-31.03.2020 verfügbar, evtl. auch ein paar Tage länger bis in den April hinein.  Im Haushalt leben sehr liebe Katzen, daher wäre es gut wenn du keine Allergie hast und Tiere auch gerne magst.  Ich freue mich auf eure Nachrichten!

This is a new, modern, stylish, very bright, freshly renovated and re furnished 1 bedroom apartment.  All the utilities, including kitchen and bathroom, are new. It has a wireless internet, a TV, and a DVD player. There is a big bathtub, a shower, and a washing machine in the bathroom. In the kitchen there is a new fridge and a stove. The living room area includes a brand new double sofa bed.  The apartment is located a few steps away from all the major transport systems: Hermann Str. It's right next to a lively street with small shops, bakeries, an ice cream parlour, internet cafés, and an office of an English speaking doctor, as well as a newly opened Hermann Quarter (a shopping center that includes 2 major grocery stores, a pharmacy, and a bank),  It's only a 15 min metro ride to Mitte (city centre) It is located just a short walk away from the Tempelhofer Park - a huge public hang out place for biking, jogging, sun bathing, skateboarding, picnic/barbecue, playing basketball, football, tennis, ping pong, etc.  Comfortably sleeps 1-3 people on a big brand new single bed. title: Apartamento 176 m2 garaje teléfono Vedado Habana Cuba
description: Cómodo apartamento de 176 m2 en céntrica calle del Vedado, La Habana, Cuba. Cuatro amplios dormitorios; tres baños. Ideal como vivienda, oficina o renta. A 200 metros del Malecón Habanero. Zona libre de inundaciones en caso de ciclones o cuando se producen desbordamientos de mar. Está en la segunda planta, a la que se accede por cómoda escalera de mármol con pasamanos.   Comfy 176 square meters apartment, located in a central street in downtown Vedado, la Habana, Cuba. Three store building, of a solid capitalist construction, with only two neighbors per floor. The apartment is located in the second floor, with access through a wide marble stair with a comfortable handrail. It has private telephone contract, and garage with its own closet. Own installation of running water. Its distributed in a 20 square meters roofed terrace with crystal windows, 30 square meters living/dining room with a beautiful glass cabinet embedded into the wall, independent 9 square meters kitchen with exterior access to a private covered laundry area, four bedrooms of 15, 14, 13 and 9 square meters respectively, all of them with built-in closets, two interspersed bathrooms, and an additional independent bathroom. Ideal as home property, office or property to rent. 200 meters from the Malecon Habanero. Area free from flooding in case of tropical cyclones, or sea overflows.

title: 24m2 Music Production
description: 24m2 Music Production studio available for long term rental.   The rooms, such as this one, are fitted with isolation and acoustic treatment. We built 24 spaces in the building, finished in January, and there are 3 spaces remaining.  As so many music spaces are systematically closing in Berlin, we decided to build a new one with safe long term (open ended, max 10 yr) contracts (with 2 month cancellation period).   The space is located in a large upcoming creative industry location, due to be finished with a concert hall, night club and gastronomy in the following year. The early bird catches the worm!   This is commercial space so you can legally run a business there, offset the MwSt and deduct the rental from your income tax.   We have curated the space with professional music makers from many genres, particularly electronic music production, as the renovation of the building by bass control specialists Kiss Your Ears made it possible to do so.   We invested heavily in the isolation between the rooms particularly, so you can work there freely with 24/7 access.  The space costs 650 eur all in, warm.   Any further acoustic enhancements to the rooms can be done so at production cost in collaboration with Kiss Your Ears, allowing your dream studio to be built up at less than the cost of DIY, should you so wish!   To arrange a viewing, contact:   I need a music studio "at" gmail "dot" com

title: ONE BEDROOM APT with LARGE COVERED PATIO!
description: This apartment in the heart of Friedrichshain is perfectly equipped and beautifully furnished for your stay. It provides comfort for up to 2 guests, there is a queen-sized bed in the quiet bedroom; the cozy sofa in the living room can be transformed into a comfy bed. The modern kitchen has everything from a dishwasher to a coffee machine and of course dishes and cutlery. The dining table is placed next to the balcony with bottom to top windows. In case you need some distraction, the apartment offers 1 flat-screen TV, DVD Player with Blu Ray, Wireless Internet. The modern bathroom has a shower cubicle and floor heating. Hairdryer, iron, ironing board and a safe are provided too.

title: --Sweet Beautiful 1 Bed-- Apartment in --Prenzlauer Berg---
description: The bright and beautifully furnished apartment, perfectly furnished for two persons, is located in the attractive district of Prenzlauer Berg.  The light-flooded and the modernly furnished living room has a comfortable sitting area with sofa. In case of a visit, this sofa can be folded out as a bed.  Next to the living room is the kitchen with a small dining area. It is fully equipped with a ceramic hob, fridge, freezer, oven, and dishwasher. All utensils for the daily need are also available. The bright bedroom has a comfortable double bed and plenty of storage space. The spacious bathroom is equipped with a window and shower. The modern and bright furnishing of the apartment gives it a friendly, inviting living ambiance.

title: Modern+&+Stylish+Apartment+Located+in+The+Trendy+Mitte+District
description: 3BR /135 m2 available now  furnished  apartment  w/d in unit  no smoking  wheelchair accessible  This 135 sqm luxurious 3 bedroom apartment with games and music room in the basement is in a class of its own. 10 people can enjoy a wonderful stay in Berlin in lovingly designed 2 bedrooms (on request sofa and mattresses for a further 2 persons). A large living and dining area with open kitchen, a beautiful seating area and a huge table offer a dreamlike living experience, especially for large groups.  BEDS:  There are 3 bedrooms in total: In the first bedroom there is 1 double bed (1.40x2m). The second bedroom has 1 double beds, in the third is a double bed (1.60x2m).  BATHS:  There are a total of 2 bathrooms. The larger one has a bathtub, the smaller one is a shower room. Extremely tastefully designed.  STYLE:  The apartment is simply breathtaking: each room has its own charm and style, the large lounge area with its spacious seating area and table leave nothing to be desired. The (party / game) cellar can be reached via a staircase in the lounge area. There you will find a fascinating atmosphere, to relax, to listen to music and, of course, to play football.  TECHNOLOGY:  W-Lan, flatscreen TV, DVD, hi-fi system, radio, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, iPod docking station.

title: QUALITY MUSIC PRODUCTION SPACES FOR LONG TERM RENTAL
description: Neighbours banging on the walls while you’re trying to make banging beats? Getting knocks on the door when trying to tune your sub bass and kicks? Paper thin walls in your current worskpace ruining the comfortable connection with your music?  And that’s not to mention how your current room actually sounds…  Most rooms have low frequency problems (everything below 300 Hz). When left untreated, mixes will not translate to another system/room. In fact, in an untreated room, you are typically hearing over 60% the room rather than what is coming out of your speakers.  Want a mixing room that will allow your tracks to translate effortlessly to other playback systems and environments? One with 24/7 access, isolation and a cool community attached?  We offer SAFE LONG TERM CONTRACTS - our facility is near Wedding. We built 24 new rooms and there are currently 3 remaining.  If you would like to arrange a viewing with us, contact  Kontaktinfo anzeigen   The building is in a new creative complex with concert hall, night club, gastronomy, etc. being built this year. The early bird catches the worm!  I need a music studio “at” gmail “dot” com  We look forward to hearing from you!

title: cOZY rOOM fOR rENT iN sHARED hOUSE iN tEMPELHOF-sCHÖNEBERG
description: Really? Tell me more...  You will love the winter garden. It's spacious, flooded with light, and it has a heating system to keep you warm during winter. As if that weren't enough, you also have a large patio where you can share drinks with the new flatmates on hot summer days.  We think it’s ideal for outgoing individuals. Known for its diversity and its lively nightlife, Tempelhof-Schöneberg offers a wide variety of green spaces, trendy eateries, and shopping opportunities for you to enjoy on your weekend adventures.  Your top 3 reasons to live here:  Your plants can grow strong and healthy in the winter garden. Afternoon drinks in the patio? Yes, please. Freizeitpark Marienfelde is a 15-minute walk away. But you need to know this...  Some of the beds do not come with a mattress. Please talk to your landlord about this. The landlord will install a TV in the living room. The shelves you see in Bedroom 1 will be assembled by the time you move in. And this...  The video only shows the first floor. The rest of the house is undergoing renovations at the moment. There will be a laundry room in the basement. This is still under construction. Your Home-checker, Anna, said:  “I loved this property. It’s a really nice house in a multicultural Berlin neighbourhood.”  Help me make up my mind…  This is a spacious shared house on Pfabener Weg, Berlin. It boasts a bright winter garden and a generous patio, in a vibrant neighbourhood with plenty of things to do.  This house is perfect for someone who's sociable and outgoing. Tempelhof-Schöneberg is one of the most popular areas in Berlin and it's easy to see why; parks, museums, and shops are all within arm's reach.More Information: homespace.website/njk8-nopromoted

title: Ausgestattete Modellbauwerkstatt
description: Outfitted modelbuilding workshop to share! I invite you to share my workshop. It is outfitted with various hand and power tools. Beautiful and convenient location at Sbahn Nölldnerplatz. I'm looking for a professional modelbuilder who will use the workshop daily. I use the workshop mostly on weekends and evenings. The price includes tools, electricity, internet etc.

title: COSY sTUDIO aPARTMENT fOR rENT iN tREPTOW-kÖPENICK
description: Really? Tell me more...  You'll feel warm and comfy in this tidy apartment. It offers open-plan living, with a simple stylish decor, comfy sofa, and cool pendant light. Brew a pot of coffee and curl up with a good book.  We think this apartment is perfect for bookworms, writers, and academics looking for a little slice of heaven. The area is peaceful, with the river right next door.  Your top three reasons to rent this apartment:  The couches are comfortable, and make perfect reading spots. The living room is spacious, with a TV and large windows. There is a desk available for writing, work or study. But you need to know this:  This apartment is one of a set. That means there are some other almost identical units in the building. So, what you see above may be a tiny, tiny bit different to what you actually rent. Give it to me straight:  This is a cute and cosy studio apartment on Lindenstraße, Berlin. The space is tidy and bright, with comfortable furnishings including sofas and a desk.  This apartment is perfect for book lovers and writers. The area is quiet, and surrounded by natural scenes, such as the Ernst-Grube-Park. No smokers sorry.More Information: homespace.website/kxyh-nopromoted

title: COSY & LAVISHLY EQUIPPED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT
description: Located on the 2nd floor with elevator, this apartment overlooks a quiet street. It sleeps 2 people.  The main room overlooks the street (double glazed windows) and is very bright thanks to a large glass door which gives access to a small balcony.  Hard wood floor. The room consists of a double bed (140 * 190), an armchair, a coffee table, a TV (cabled) and a library. Wifi and DSL internet connection at your disposal.  The kitchen is open to the main room that can be closed with sliding shutters. It is equipped with 4 gas burners, refrigerator with freezer, an oven, a microwave, a dish washer, a toaster and an electric kettle.  You have at your disposal all necessary dishes. For your meals, you will have a bar table with 2 bar chairs.  The bathroom has a shower, a toilet, washbasin with mirror, a washing machine and a dryer.  At disposal a large closet in the entrance.  For your convenience towels and linens are provided.  Central heating.  Price per month : 600€ Utilities included except electricity and gas Minimum stay : 3 Months  Maximum stay : 24 Months Security deposit : Between one and two months Agency fees: No agency fee, private listing.  ***BEING A PRIVATE LISTING, I ASK YOU TO PLEASE WRITE YOUR EMAIL WHEN REPLYING***

Das Haus ist komplett eingerichtet und ausgestattet: - 62 m² - 2 Räume mit einem (1) Bett, Sofa, Schrank, Schreibtisch, TV - Küche mit Herd, Kühlschrank, Waschmaschine und Geschirr - Duschbad mit WC - DSL Anschluss - Eigene Zentralheizung Monatsmiete: 760,00 € kalt zuzüglich Nebenkosten:  Eigenverbrauch Strom, Wasser und Heizung zuzüglich Kaution. title: Appartamento in affitto a Leopoldplatz (da privato)
description: Da privato. Solo per italiani con nazionalita' italiana. Appartamento situato a Trift Strasse 7  13353 Berlino. Appartamento di 60 mq con 3 camere: Cucina indipendente, Salone e camera da letto. Bagno con doccia. Riscaldamento centralizzato. Attrezzature esterne: Cortile Posteggio biciclette   Vantaggi dell'alloggio:  L'appartamento è situato in una zona centrale, vivace e multietnica di Berlino Wedding in un antico palazzo ed è stato completamente ristrutturato. La cucina è completa (piastre elettriche, frigorifero, piatti, bicchieri, posate, ciotole, pentole ecc). Si trova al 4° piano di un immobile tipicamente berlinese. Situato a due passi dalla metropolitana fermata Wedding e Leopoldplatz. Negozi, alimentari, fornaio, supermercato, farmacia, ristoranti ecc sono direttamente sotto casa e dietro l'angolo nella vivacissima Mullerstrasse:  Il Potzdamerplatz si raggiunge in 6 fermate. Unter den Linden e la Porta di Brandeburgo in 5 fermate, la Friedrichstrasse in 4 fermate. Accesso alla metropolitana, al tram e ad ogni altra comodità a prossimità immediata.

title: WARNING!!
description: WARNING!   Most advertisers here are scammers who only try to get you to pay him or her as soon as possible without even having to talk to the person. Read the ads carefully and compare the address with Google Maps to see if it seems right.  You can also ask for newly taken photos of the apartment to ensure that the person in question actually has access to the apartment.  Last but not least, never pay without having the contract in your hands  If you are looking for good and affordable apartments in Berlin you can write to me and i will give you a few good landlords in Berlin for free ;-) Contact me...

title: /Central Located 1BD Apartment in Charlie in Mitte!! Offers it All/
description: The apartment is located in the most artsy, colourful, and fun part of Prenzlauerberg. The location is unbeatable. You'll find yourself surrounded by all kinds of restaurants & cafés, cinemas, designer shops, bars, parks and beautiful squares like Kollwizplatz and Helmholplatz. On the corner is the Kulturbrauerei and the super hip Kastanienallee leading to Mitte. 3 minutes away is the former GDR border and the "Mauerpark" which has an amazing flee market and a surreal karaoke on sundays. Famous sights like Hackescher Markt, Alexanderplatz and Museum Island are 5 minutes away with public transportation. Also in the corner there is a great bio supermarket.

title: Book.Live: Vollmöbliertes Single-Studio für Studenten
description: The apartment house THE FIZZ Berlin has a total of 212 modern fully furnished studios for students *, each of which is equipped with its own pantry kitchen and a shower room. There are also various common rooms in the house for celebrating, cooking together, quiet learning and relaxing, as well as a screen for film evenings. Jedes Jahr nehmen wir am 48-Stunden-Neukölln-Festival teil und zeigen eine Theateraufführung in einem Teil des Ateliers. Wir beantworten gerne Deine Fragen bezüglich der Räume oder schicken ein Foto.   1 Atelier space in Donaustraße near Stadtbad Neukölln  Space separated by nice rough wooden walls in an open space of 160m2. We are 6: one writer, one performance artist, one painter/graphic designer, one filmmaker, a visual artist and an illustrator. The atelier is a beautiful big room with high ceilings and plenty of daylight in a former light industrial building in Neukölln. Hinterhof, 3rd floor. We are looking for open, reliable and responsible people enjoying an inspired and uncomplicated sharing of the space. Occupations that involve frequent telephone calls and business meetings, also those causing noise, dust or strong smells are not possible. title: Fully Furnished 1 Room Apart in trendiest Neighborhood
description: Genuine and charming apartment located within Neukölln and Kreuzberg, the trendiest areas in Berlin.   Well-known for the mix of the old and new. Artist and students. People from all around the world.   The apartment is just 200 mtrs far away from the delightful Maybachufer Canal and his always excited Market.   Surrounded by restaurants, cafes and a wide offer of bars. Just in the corner with Weisserstrasse, everything you might look for is at a short walking distance ( Bergmannkiez, Kottbusser, Görlitzer Park area... 15 min to Warschauer!)  Very well connected by public transports. 3 stops to Alexanderplatz. 2 minutes walking to Hermanplatz (U7/U8). Several bus lines to city center and airport (M29/ M41/ 194/ N8/ 171) nearby 24/7.   Fully furnished, conveniently located on the 1st floor of a Altbauwohnung. Original natural woods floorboards with 3.5 mtr high ceiling and outsized windows. The whole apartment is exterior, facing the backyard (quiet and cozy).  The 50 sq meters Altbau grants: kitchen, bathroom with shower and a large - bright living and bedroom.   King Size bed (with an outstanding matress) and a big cupboard at your complete disposal. Big table for dining or office purposes and a comfortable sofa.  Fully equipped kitchen (cutlery, pottery, crockery, oven, stove, toaster, kettle, huge and modern fridge and freezer).   Spacious bathroom with shower (hair-dryer). Big en-suite washing machine. Bed linen and towels provided.  The apartment is available from the  04th until the 29th of March. ( few days flexible backward / forward) )  PRICE:  1 week = 300€ 2 weeks = 500€   200 € deposit is required ( refundable on check out)  All the utilities are included in the price (incl. WiFi connection)  *More pictures availables on request* **For any question or info, do not hesitate contact me**  ***ANMELDUNG IS NOT POSSIBLE. Sorry***

title: Gorgeous, Cozy 1BR/1BA - 9ft Ceilings, Pet Friendly, AC!
description: This cozy and functional flat is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. It´s a very good starting point for discovering Berlin and as it is located in a very quiet courtyard you can recover there from your long days and nights. It has a comfortable king-size bed and is furnished with original 60ies furniture. Within some minutes walk you are in the famous "Mauerpark" with a vintage market and karaoke on Sundays and also "Kastanienallee" with its shops and bars is very close. S- Bahn and underground are nearby and bakeries, shops, and cafés are all around the corner.

title: BRAND NEW*1BD*1BA*W/D IN UNIT*SS APPLIANCES*
description: I offer a cosy 1 bedroom apartment in a lovely Berlin style apartment. My apartment is located in the picturesque area of Prenzlauer Berg, which is one of the highend locations in Berlin. This stylish "Kiez" Berlin slang for neighborhood is known for its beautiful historical buildings and unique atmosphere. Just outside the door step you'll find tons of restaurants, cafes, shops and bars. Sightseeing highlights like Alexanderplatz are 10 min. away with tram or subway.

title: UPGRADED 1 & 1 BED APTS! PET-FRIENDLY! NOW RENTING !

title: ROOFTOP STUDIO IN NEUKÖLLN NEAR VOLKSPARK HASENHEIDE AND RATHAUS NEUKÖ
description: App. 45 sqm (484 sf)  2 persons max. 5th floor (lift)  Fully Equipped Kitchen Digital TV Open Kitchen Balcony / Terrace Washing Machine Sofa Microwave Bed Linen & Towels Bathroom with Shower WIFI Connection Living Room Green View Queen Size Bed 1,60x2m The Apartment  This bright and cosy rooftop studio apartment is perfect for one person or a couple. There is a queen size bed, a big cupboard and a Sony Tv for home entertainment. The open plan kitchen is fully equipped including a microwave. Enjoy breakfast and meals at the dining table which can seat up to three persons or on the balcony. The bright bathroom has a shower and washing machine. The apartment can be reached comfortably by a lift  Location  The apartment is located in Neukoelln near Boddinstrasse and Rathaus Neukoelln. In this multicultural area you will find lots of students, clubs, cafes and loads of shops and diverse restaurants. Also the annual art festival 48 Stunden Neukoelln takes place every summer where hundreds of creatives from Berlins and other countries present themselves. The U8 Boddinstraße and U7 Rathaus Neukoelln take you into every part of town conveniently.   Rent all incl. 500 euro/month

title: BRIGHT STYLISH FLAT IN P'BERG WITH SUNNY BALCONY - 28 Feb til 15 Mar
description: hi, i am offering my delightful home to a responsible person or couple or even family.  It is available for around two weeks from February 28th til March 15th 2020. The cost is 800€ which includes all utility bills etc! This is at a discount to our airbnb listing which costs 650€ per week. If you would like to rent it out for a shorter period during the timeframe then it might also be possible.  Hidden within a little cul-de-sac off Stargarder Straße in Prenzlauerberg is this gem of a home. The spacious south facing second floor flat overlooks a childrens playground and a church. The sun shines throughout the day lighting up the living room with natural light. There is a balcony also, perfect for warm summer evenings. It is very well connected with transport networks, with Schönhauser Allee just a two minute walk away which links the U-bahn, S-bahn and the tram service.  There is a fantastic selection of good and affordable restaurants in the area, with vietnamese, italian, greek and many others just on Stargarder Straße. There are also many cool bars and cafes to hang out at. Mauer Park is just a ten minute walk to the west where you will find the famous vintage flea market open on Sundays.  The flat itself is very spacious but warm and cosy and attention to detail and style is prominent from the kitchen through to the bedroom. There is a washing machine, fridge/freezer, hob/cooker tv, and an audio setup for music. The bedroom is large with a brand new queen size bed. Clean sheets and towels are provided. The bathroom has a shower and a bath tub! High-Speed Wi-Fi is available!  We really love our home and we only want to give it to someone who is caring and trustworthy. The flat is in a family orientated neighbourhood, therefore if you are looking for a party flat it is probably not the right one for you. Strictly no smoking inside, you can use the balcony.  if you have any queries please don't hesitate to get in touch.  p.s. The photos are actually a little outdated so the flat is looking much more homely with art on the walls and big vibrant cacti and plants. :)  Best,  Jim & Vick.

title: Bright & furnished studio next to Tempelhof Park
description: My bright studio apartment will be available for rent from 1st March for a minimum of 3 months, ideally longer. The apartment is furnished and comes with all bills and wifi included.  Rent 990 EUR/ month

title: Bright 1BR with big garden in Wedding
description: Renting out my beautiful flat in Wedding in a really nice neighborhood from March for minimum 4 months or longer.  This flat is situated in the up and coming borough of Wedding, historically a communist workers district which has recently been discovered by artists, designers and other young entrepreneurs.   You're really well connected here. With access to the S-Bahn ring, the underground, the tram and buses of course (U6, U9, M13) no place in Berlin is further than a 20 min journey. The nearest underground station (Nauener Platz) is on the same road and only a 5 min walk away. From here you can get to Mitte in about 10 minutes. The tram taking you directly through Prenzlauer Berg and to Friedrichshain's party areas is around the corner, a 2 min walk away. It's only 10 minutes by bus to the main railway station and you have a superb and fast connection to Tegel Airport!  The bright upper ground floor, 40 square meter flat consists of a living/ sleeping room, separate kitchen, bathroom, entrance area and a fantastic large private garden which looks out onto a preserved lightbulb factory.   All rooms have big windows and allow for plenty of light. Very high ceilings, coving elements make this a really pleasant place to base yourself in Berlin. The area is very beautiful, filled with many 19th century buildings, wide streets and gas lamp lined sidewalks which turn every night-time stroll into a romantic affair.   There are plenty of nice cafes, some bars and restaurants, which are always filled with life. Weddings Schillerpark is only a 5 min walk away and 5 min by bike you will get to the Rehberge which is a large urban woodland with a lake and sandy beach, perfect for the summer! It also hosts the open air summer cinema which I can highly recommend.   Everything you need is a maximum 5 min walk away. Busy and multi-cultural Muellerstrasse (128 nationalities live here!) is literally around the corner -- it's Wedding's main commercial street, filled with food shops, supermarkets, laundrettes etc. Also the derelict factory building which you can see from the garden has now been turned into a small commercial building where you can do your shopping, eat out, go to the gym or visit one of the galleries that just opened recently. Also there is a regular flea market on the tree & cafe lined church square just down the road.   As for the flat itself. . .   KITCHEN is equipped with stove/ oven, fridge, washing machine dining area with private views into the garden. We have also built a 'staircase' which now leads into the garden directly from the kitchen window. You can also access it via a door on the side of the flat though.   BATHROOM is very bright and has great garden with factory views directly from the shower. Both kitchen and bathroom are very private since the garden means you have no neighbours looking into your windows.   MAIN ROOM has several cosy areas, i.e. a floating high bed, a library and the sofa area. It's sunny in the afternoon and allows for a lay-in since the sun rises in the kitchen and bathroom.   HALLWAY has a large inbuilt wardrobe enough to hold plenty of clothes for 2 people and additional storage at the very top.   PRIVATE GARDEN is the best and my favourite bit. Especially in the summers, the factory walls which reach into the garden get overgrown with all kinds of beautiful plants and create a spectacular and peaceful backdrop.  For the garden enthusiasts, there is always something to look after, especially in the vegetable plots.   Rent includes all bills and internet for 990 EUR a month

title: Gorgeous huge 1bd Wedding Feb-oct or one yr! sublet / share later
description: LOOKING FOR A SPECIAL SUBLET PERSON / I am offering the sublet  7/8 months to one year BUT YOU MUST READ WHOLE THING TO EXPLAIN !!  I am SUBLETTING my space from february (or march) - october or ONE YEAR. with the possibility i may give the lease over the person/not sure…   I am in a very tricky situation in my life. I love my Berlin life… I do not want to leave and hopefully I can  save my space finding a GOOD, TRUSTING, DECENT QUIET FEMALE but right now, I have a family health emergency (which has been ongoing) and i have to be  away several months, maybe even a year… and i need someone  who will FIT IN here, hopefully speak german, and not bring too much attention to the fact i have to be away. Someone who doesnt’ have furniture and someone who doesn’t have an issue with SHARING the space if i need to come back !!  570 a month for a one bedroom, huge 72 qm space in Wedding near SEE STRASSE UBAHN, centrally located. small bathroom with shower, huge kitchen, and huge living room. There are 2 balconies. The apt is stunning, everyone loves the decor (antiques) You hear the birds in the morning, and if you want to start a garden on the balcony the landlord would love you!  The person who comes in here has to be easy to communicate with, respectful  of other people, CONSCIOUS, aware, and awake please and WORKING!!  This building is OLD SCHOOL, i.e. people live here for over 20 years, they don’t care as long as there is quiet, and respect for each other’s lives, so no coming in at 3 am, slamming doors etc.  Someone who enjoys the space as a sanctuary to come home to, to write, but  no parties. There are so many amazing YOGA spaces round here. There are green parks here and wonderful walking and Plotzensee is down the road. This area is NOT highly gentrified and still has a cool  old school german vibe to it. Speaking German would Help not req!!  So the ROOMMATE situation occurs MAY BE in jUNE / JULY when i have to come back for a few days or weeks. I am not sure. Because of the HEALTH issue I have to go day by day with my family situation!! I DO NOT KNOW.  You could end up having the space for one year for yourself… but i know i have to come back june or july just to show myself…. so for a few days. But if things calm down in NY I may return for a few months so you have to be ok to share with me. I’m a quiet, gay writer, i usually work nIGHTS, so it would help for the person to work 9-5 so each would have the space to themselves…. the rent would go down to 380 a month…   I’m an older, but still funky dude girl writer! I like my space to think and write, but I’m also super social and would love to share this space with a curious, but NO DRAMA person who likes her space too, but also likes to hang out with a coffee and chat  here and there….. Again, I repeat, there is a GOOD chance you could have this space for the whole time period on your own!!  Please email me a bit about yourself… i’ll email photos!! And please please send me your NORMAL email (i always have some issues with the emails) PLEASE PLEASE GET IN TOUCH RIGHT AWAY… i’m trying to get this sorted asap.. so as not to get stuck!! My place is now sublet til Feb 1  thanks and blessings and lets believe in miracles.. cause i sure need one now!

title: FURNISHED BERLIN CENTER APARTMENT
description: These self-catering apartments offer free WiFi and an on-site café. They lie in Berlin's central Mitte district, just 100 m from Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz Underground Station and one stop from Alexanderplatz.  Apartments offers a range of spacious accommodations with wooden floors and high ceilings. Each apartment has a living room with an open kitchen, a dining table and a flat-screen TV. Some feature a balcony and elevator access.  Located on the ground floor of the complex, café offers drinks and snacks. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the stylish restaurant opposite from Apartments.  The Apartments are located on the edge of the lively Prenzlauer Berg district. Many bars, cafés and restaurants, and good places for breakfast can be found nearby. The popular Hackescher Markt area is a 10-minute walk away.  A shuttle service to Tegel Airport or Schönefeld Airport is available on request at the Apartments.

description: Located in the quiet, leafy and residential area of Wilmersdorf / Charlottenburg in the west of the city, a wonderfully light and airy 130 sq.m three bedroom apartment on the third floor of a traditional early twentieth century Berlin apartment building with open plan kitchen / living / dining area. Directly opposite is a children's playground and on-street table tennis so the apartment has the added benefit of not being overlooked from the other side of the street. Within walking distance of the Berlin's main shopping street, the Ku'damm and one minute way from Fehrbelinerplatz u-Bahn station giving easy access to the whole city via U3 and U7 lines.

title: sTYLISH pRIVATE sTUDIO fOR rENT iN cOLIVING sPACE nEXT tO pOTSDAM uNIV
description: An amazing ensemble of modern, exquisitely designed buildings  Because you’re a student (or work at the university) – and you want to live with like-minded people in a cool urban-living space – just 1-minute from Potsdam University.  What's so cool about coliving?...  Coliving is a new concept in renting. Rather than live alone, you rent in a building with like-minded peers. It’s a bit like living in a student hall of residence because you share social spaces with your peers. But unlike a hall of residence, coliving spaces work to create happy individuals and healthy communities.  Living here, you get to meet new people from all over the world. People with different stories, original perspectives, and shared values. You'll make friends, learn surprising lessons, and love the experience. And you get everything you need in one place More Information: homespace.website/6fkv-nopromoted

title: Great offer: central, quiet w/balcony and garden
description: I am offering my apartment for rent from 5 of February until 8 of April for 980 EUR per month including utilities. It is located on a quiet street,  with lots lots of markets, cafes, perfect shopping options to walking distance.  I am the owner of this apartement and renovated it with natural materials (clay walls, natural stones....) and non-toxic paint some years ago.  It has one sleeping bedroom, one extra guestroom with a double bed (with flatscreen TV), one living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a washing machine. The bathroom has rain shower and the largest room is the living room with a nice balcony.  In the price included is landline connection, WIFI, TV.  The apartment is bright with windows to south/west and north/east, on the 2nd floor in an old, well kept landmark building - very quiet with view into a large garden with big trees.  It is centrally located in Mitte/Wedding - the multicultural neighborhood - with excellent subway connections (U 6 and U 9), tram connection and several bus lines, all within few minute walking distance. As orientation: to get to Friedrichstr. S Bahn Station it takes 8 minutes by subway.  The neighborhood is pleasant with many shopping possibilities around the corner including several farmer markets,  supermarkets, organic store, cafes, pubs and restaurants. Close by is a huge park perfect for running.  For further information and more images, please contact me.     Katia

title: Beautiful sunny apartment with balcony in Friedrichshain
description: >>> Available in February <<<  2 rooms, 1 bedroom 65 sqm, 700 square feet  Beautifully furnished. Available for mid-term rental (3-6months).   The apartment is newly renovated and beautifully decorated with classic pieces of mid-century modern design furniture. It has a large balcony and lots of light from the floor to ceiling windows in every room. It's on the first floor, and has a large and comfortable elevator. Heated floors and excellent insulation make it easy to maintain the desired temperature.   Contains a  fully fitted modern kitchen with a dishwasher, bathroom with bathtub and shower as well as a washing machine.  The apartment has access to a cozy private garden perfect for soaking up the sun.  The neighborhood is quiet, but it's very well connected, being two blocks from Warschauer S-Bahn/U-Bahn station. 15 minutes to Alexaderplatz via public transport. Two blocks from a supermarket as well, and a short walk from numerous restaurants and bars, east side gallery, or a walk along the canal.

title: Studio-Apartment near Schillerkiez!
description: Object description:  The 4-storied-apartment-building from the end of the 19th century, was beautifully renovated. The 3 flats on each floor are between (hidden) bedrooms, a modern bathroom and a luxurious fitted kitchen. Each flat is equipped with its own balcony.  Equipment: Each flat is fully furnished and each room has parquet flooring layed out.  The kitchen is equipped with: electric stove an oven,  refrigerator, washing machine, dish washer, coffee machine as well as tableware and cutlery.  Bedroom: Double bed 140x200 including sheets (sheets, fitted sheets and pillowcases)  Bathroom: modern shower,  towel dryer, towels Livingroom: Flatscreen TV.  Wifi is included available in every room   Position: A beautiful district in the heart of Berlin, the Templehofer Feld is within walking distance. The Thomasstraße is a quiet side street of Hermannstraße. The next undergrood station U8 Leinestraße in within a walking distance of 2 minutes. Besides the many shopping opportunities available in the nearby HermannQuartier, you’ll also find a couple of restaurants and a medical center. The public local transport system in this area is excellent. The famous “Schiller-Kiez”, located between the Tempelhofer Feld and Hermannstraße, is characterized by its variety of restaurants and its vibrant nightlife. The weekly farmers market at Genezarthkirche is regarded by many as a secret tip.  Miscellaneous: At the end of the lease periode, a final cleaning fee will be charged.

title: Bergmannkiez February Roommate
description: Hello All, I'm searching for a roommate for the month of February - with the possibility of extending until April 1st. The apartment is directly around the corner from Bergmannstr., with cafes, restaurants, and shopping right out the door. It is a super convenient walk to the U7 or U6. This neighborhood is well known for weekend markets, the Markthalle, and beautiful Victoria Park just a few blocks away.   I'm a middle-aged, clean and friendly vegetarian. I sleep on the floor in the living room area when I'm renting the room so I'm looking for someone who is ok with using one room and the kitchen. Both rooms have doors so we don't hear each other at night.   The apartment is furnished with everything you'll need for a happy stay. I've been renting on Airbnb the past month while working on my art business, which has been a bit of a rollercoaster ride. One sweet person would be a breath of fresh air.  The costs are €550 + €500 security for February. If we get along great, I can extend this. Registration is not included with this temporary rental.

The wooden floors, the furniture and all of the things you may use should be treated with a lot of care. There is a big desk, plants and a lot of space. The apartment has pretty much everything one needs, including a washing machine and a little balcony. I have made a negative experience while renting the room out once before, which is why I ask for the 650 Euros as a security deposit. In case everything will remain intact and especially the wooden surfaces won't receive additional scratches or damage through moisture, there need to be no worries for an easy and quick refund. I sleep on a thin mattress on top of high quality Tatami mats in a custom made frame, which I prefer to a regular bed, since I prefer to sleep on a bit harder grounds. If you prefer to sleep on softer beding, please bring your own additional padding, or even better: Mattress.   I am a sculptor and will work in the US for the time I will rent out my room. My roommate is easy going, very clean and kind. The sublet will not include an Anmeldung/Registration possibility. You will be my guest.

title: BRIGHT STYLISH FLAT IN P'BERG WITH SUNNY BALCONY - 28 Feb til 15 Mar
description: hi, i am offering my delightful home to a responsible person or couple or even family.  It is available for around two weeks from February 28th til March 15th 2020. The cost is 800€ which includes all utility bills etc! This is at a discount to our airbnb listing which costs 650€ per week.   Hidden within a little cul-de-sac off Stargarder Straße in Prenzlauerberg is this gem of a home. The spacious south facing second floor flat overlooks a childrens playground and a church. The sun shines throughout the day lighting up the living room with natural light. There is a balcony also, perfect for warm summer evenings. It is very well connected with transport networks, with Schönhauser Allee just a two minute walk away which links the U-bahn, S-bahn and the tram service.  There is a fantastic selection of good and affordable restaurants in the area, with vietnamese, italian, greek and many others just on Stargarder Straße. There are also many cool bars and cafes to hang out at. Mauer Park is just a ten minute walk to the west where you will find the famous vintage flea market open on Sundays.  The flat itself is very spacious but warm and cosy and attention to detail and style is prominent from the kitchen through to the bedroom. There is a washing machine, fridge/freezer, hob/cooker tv, and an audio setup for music. The bedroom is large with a brand new queen size bed. Clean sheets and towels are provided. The bathroom has a shower and a bath tub! High-Speed Wi-Fi is available!  We really love our home and we only want to give it to someone who is caring and trustworthy. The flat is in a family orientated neighbourhood, therefore if you are looking for a party flat it is probably not the right one for you. Strictly no smoking inside, you can use the balcony.  if you have any queries please don't hesitate to get in touch.  p.s. The photos are actually a little outdated so the flat is looking much more homely with art on the walls and big vibrant cacti and plants. :)  Best,  Jim & Vick.

title: Looking for a room in Berlin – offering one in Paris (March-Oct. 2020)
description: Hey, I am an Austrian doctoral student in philosophy and sociology living in Paris and looking for a room to rent in a flatshare or for a small flat in Berlin during my visit at the German-French Centre Marc Bloch from March 1st to October 31st 2020. My limit for monthly rent is around 650€ and the flat should be located within the Ring. I am looking for caring flatmates with some team spirit; a robust kitchen (I love epic cooking); ideally, a green area somewhere near the flat (I indulge in running); and some tolerance of music (I am listening to a lot of it and will bring my classical guitar with me). Also, I can offer to swap flats with my room in a marvellous Parisian flatshare for the time of my visit in Berlin (Métro Ménilmontant, 650€ per month). I am happy to send more informations.  *** Hi, ich (31, Österreicher, am Ende meines Doktorats in Philosophie und Soziologie in Paris und Wien) suche ein WG-Zimmer (aus Überzeugung) oder eine kleine Wohnung in Berlin vom 1.3. bis zum 31.10.2020, für die Zeit meines Aufenthalts am deutsch-französischen Centre Marc Bloch. Preislich kann ich bis 650€/Monat gehen und es wäre schön, wenn die Wohnung innerhalb des Rings läge. Ich suche interessierte, solidarische MitbewohnerInnen; eine belastbare Küche (ich koche gerne zu viel); idealerweise eine Grünfläche in der Nähe (ich laufe nicht wenig); und ein wenig Toleranz für Musik (ich höre viel und komme in Begleitung einer klassischen Gitarre). Ich könnte gegebenenfalls meinen (großartigen) WG-Platz in Paris (Métro Ménilmontant, 650€/Monat) für die Zeit meines Berlin-Aufenthalts tauschen. Bei Bedarf schicke ich gerne weitere Infos.  *** Salut, je suis un doctorant autrichien en philosophie et sociologie à la recherche d’une colocation ou d’un petit appartement à Berlin pour mon séjour au Centre franco-allemand Marc Bloch du 1er mars au 31 octobre 2020. Ce serait bien si l’appart était situé à l’intérieur du Ring et que le loyer ne dépassait pas les 650€ par mois. Je cherche des colocs intéressé.e.s et solidaires ; une cuisine robuste (j’adore cuisiner en grande quantité) ; dans l’idéal, un espace vert en proximité de l’appart (je cours pas mal) ; et un peu de tolérance pour la musique (j’en écoute beaucoup et je serai accompagné de ma guitare classique). D’ailleurs, je peux proposer un troc avec ma chambre dans une formidable coloc à Paris (Métro Ménilmontant, 650€ par mois) pour la période de mon séjour à Berlin. N’hésitez pas à me contacter pour plus d’infos.

Most importantly, the location could not be more perfect, right in the heart of Graefekiez, and a block away from the beautiful Hasenheide park. Also within a short walking distance is the popular Weserstrasse, and our favorite spot in the whole city: Templehoferfeld and Schillerkiez. It is located directly between Schönleinstrasse, Hermannplatz and Südstern, with easy connections to both the U7 and U8, as well as the M41 bus, which stops directly in front of the building. Our area is safe; family friendly vibe and cafes and restaurants are within walking distance.  Metro station Ostkreuz is a 7 minute walk and brings you directly to Mitte (the city center) and Prenzlauer berg. Metro station Warschauer Strasse is a 15 min walk and gets you easily to Kreuzberg & Charlottenburg. Tram M10 also starts from here and goes to Prenzlauer berg as well. The bus to Neukölln is around the corner from our place.  Apartment is furnished and private. Washing machine in the apartment. Balcony.  We are 2 Belgians, living in Berlin since 4 years. Helle und geräumige Dreizimmerwohnung mit großem Balkon und Blick auf die Parks von Alt Tempelhof. Drei Stationen von Kreuzberg entfernt und 15 Gehminuten zum alten Flughafen Tempelhof.  Jedes Zimmer bietet Parkblick. Ganz in der Nähe der U-Bahn ist die S-Bahn in 7 Minuten zu Fuß erreichbar. Wir haben einen Geschirrspüler, Waschmaschine, Kaffeemaschine, Netflix, WLAN.
