title: My Berlin for your Tel Aviv
description: Hello dear Swapers from 31rd March until 25th of April 2020  We, a family of three with a baby, would like to swap our beautiful three room apartment in the very popular neighborhood “Akazienkiez” in Berlin Schöneberg. Around this area you’ll find dozens of cosy cafés, yummy restaurants, some bars and most important: playgrounds! 🙂   We live in a beautiful 100 sqm apartment with high ceilings, built in the early twenty century. I’ll send pictures via email if interested. Three large rooms with each around 25 sqm. One room is a living room with an XXL couch, a tv with AppleTV. We have a large office room with two desks and a bedroom with a boxspring bed and a babybay as well as a nursery (changing table for diapers). Our kitchen is well equipped and we have a washing maschine, a dish washer and a table. As you might assume we’re looking to swap a baby friendly apartment including the most important baby equipment, like a nursery, in the Center of TLV.  For further information let’s get connected   Happy swap and shavua tov, guys! Happy to hear from you... Shai

title: !!MODERN AND VERY STYLISH COMFORT VACATION APARTMENT FOR YOUR CHOICE!!
description: Bright and Modern Apartment with a in a great location heart of Berlin. I'm assuring you your best stay in this Lovely apartment located in an up-and-coming neighborhood of Berlin. This is a new, modern, stylish, very bright, freshly renovated and re furnished 2 bedroom apartment.   All the utilities, including kitchen and bathroom, are new. It has a wireless internet, a TV, and a DVD player. There is a big bathtub, a shower, and a washing machine in the bathroom. In the kitchen there is a new fridge and a stove. The living room area includes a brand new double sofa bed.  The apartment is located a few steps away from all the major transport systems: Hermann Str. U-Bahn and S-Bahn (metro/subway), buses, taxis. It's right next to a lively street with small shops, bakeries, an ice cream parlour, internet cafés, and an office of an English speaking doctor, as well as a newly opened Hermann Quarter (a shopping center that includes 2 major grocery stores, a pharmacy, and a bank),  It's only a 15 min metro ride to Mitte (city centre) It is located just a short walk away from the Tempelhofer Park - a huge public hang out place for biking, jogging, sun bathing, skateboarding, picnic/barbecue, playing basketball, football, tennis, ping pong, etc.   Comfortably sleeps 4-6 people on a big brand new single and double bed.  Tenant should be clean and well organised, You will be highly welcome to the wonderful city of Berlin and we also offer airport pick up in case you needed one.

description: Die Wohnung zeichnet sich vor allem durch ein charmantes und stilvolles Interieur aus.  Folgende Ausstattungsmerkmale sind vorhanden:   * saniert * vollausgestattete Einbauküche * Fischgrätparkett * 2 Bäder * Lichtdurchflutet * Terrasse * gespachtelte Wände.

title: Double rOOm for RENT IN APArtmENT WITH TWO bedROOms in FriedrICHshain
description: Really? Tell me more...  You bet that this place is effortlessly stylish. The beauty of simple minimalism. White walls, some statement lighting installations, and a pot-plant is all it takes to take a place from the purely comfortable to contemporary cool.  We think you will feel right at home living here. The simplicity means you can make this home your own and still appreciate the taste and elegance.  Your top 3 reasons to live here:  The kitchen is modern, sleek and fully-equipped. Location- this property is in a great neighbourhood. Your furry friends (pets) can live here with you! But you need to know this...  This apartment is one of a set. That means there are some other almost identical units in the building. So what you see above may be a tiny, tiny bit different to what you actually rent.  And this...  The multi-use co-working space is to be shared with the neighbours in your building.  Your Home-checker, Stefaniya, said:  “the living room is a very big space for you to relax with a TV and comfortable couch”  Help me make up my mind...  This is a 1st floor, two-bedroom apartment on Dirschauer Str, Berlin. The property has 1 bathroom and 1 WC, a living area and a kitchen with access to a balcony. All fully equipped and furnished, it is just ready and waiting for you now.  It is perfect for young professionals and couples wanting to live in a city centre paradise. It's located in a vibrant district full of cafes, bars and within walking distance of some of Berlin's most beautiful attractions. Urban living really did just get an upgrade.More Information: homespace.website/nmqg-nopromoted

title: Studio for RENT IN COLIVING STUDENT building in Mitte
description: The small and simple studio in Mitte  Because you're a student, and you want to live in a private studio with all the social benefits of a cool urban-living space – in one of Berlin’s most central neighbourhoods.  What's so cool about coliving?...  Coliving is a new concept in renting. Rather than live alone, you rent in a building with like-minded peers. It’s a bit like living in a student hall of residence because you share social spaces with your peers. But unlike a hall of residence, coliving spaces work to create happy individuals and healthy communities.  Living here, you’ll get to meet people from all over the world. People with different stories, original perspectives, and shared values. You'll make friends, learn surprising lessons, and love the experience. Plus you get everything you need in one place More Information: homespace.website/dw10-nopromoted

title: COSY & LAVISHLY EQUIPPED STUDIO APARTMENT FOR RENT
description: Located on the 2nd floor with elevator, this apartment overlooks a quiet street. It sleeps 2 people.  The main room overlooks the street (double glazed windows) and is very bright thanks to a large glass door which gives access to a small balcony.  Hard wood floor. The room consists of a double bed (140 * 190), an armchair, a coffee table, a TV (cabled) and a library. Wifi and DSL internet connection at your disposal.  The kitchen is open to the main room that can be closed with sliding shutters. It is equipped with 4 gas burners, refrigerator with freezer, an oven, a microwave, a dish washer, a toaster and an electric kettle.  You have at your disposal all necessary dishes. For your meals, you will have a bar table with 2 bar chairs.  The bathroom has a shower, a toilet, washbasin with mirror, a washing machine and a dryer.  At disposal a large closet in the entrance.  For your convenience towels and linens are provided.  Central heating.  Price per month : 600€ Utilities included except electricity and gas Minimum stay : 3 Months  Maximum stay : 24 Months Security deposit : Between one and two months Agency fees: No agency fee, private listing.  ***BEING A PRIVATE LISTING, I ASK YOU TO PLEASE WRITE YOUR EMAIL WHEN REPLYING***

title: My BERLIN for your LOS ANGELES. Dates flexible
description: Hi,  I am looking to to do a room swap with somebody or a couple living in Los Angeles sometime this year (Dates and duration are very flexible). I live in a beautiful two bedroom apartment with a separate big living room with a balcony overlooking a park in the Neukölln area. I'm happy to send you pictures.  You would have 1 friendly quiet room mate who isn't home much.   I am female, 32, very considerate, reliable, tidy and take very good care of other people's belongings.   I did a swap before for three months with a guy from LA and we were both really happy with it.  If you are interested in swapping places please send me a message and we can chat or skype and see if it's a good fit and we can find dates that work for both of us.

title: Beautiful 2 room apartment in top location
description: I am going on holiday and am offering my fully furnished 2 room apartment in the center of Berlin Friedrichshain from January 27 to February 26. Beautiful old house with wooden floor, wifi, washing machine and brandnew kitchen. Price: 800 Euro including everything. Write me who you are, why you are in Berlin and add your telephone number so I can call you.

title: Beautiful large apartment
description: This centrally located Kreuzberg apartment is large and bright, tastefully furnished. The apartment has 3 bedrooms. A large room with a double bed,  a small bedroom with a double bed and a kid's room with a single bed.

title: ROOM FOR RENT IN APARTMENT WITH THREE BEDROOMS, KREUZBERG
description: Really? Tell me more...  You will love this modern space. You'll get a stylish and fashionably furnished bedroom, and a fully-equipped kitchen to cook up your favourite meals. It's the perfect meeting spot to hang out with your new flatmates.  We think this apartment is ideal for sociable types. Kreuzberg is home to some of the best nightlife in Berlin. You can party by night and chill out by day at beautiful public spaces like Hasenheide Park.  Your top 3 reasons to rent here:  The bedrooms are fashionably furnished. The kitchen is equipped. Who's cooking tonight? Hasenheide Park is close by. But you need to know this…  The apartment is located on the 4th floor and there is no elevator – the perfect way to burn off those calories. Your Home-checker, Jamie, said:  “I loved this property. It’s a modern apartment close to lots of bars and restaurants.”  Help me make up my mind…  This is a modern 4th floor, 3-bedroom apartment on Kottbusser Damm, Berlin. It boasts fashionably furnished bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, and the apartment is fitted with modern fixtures throughout.  This property is ideal for sociable types. You’ll be in a central and lively neighbourhood, with nightclubs, restaurants, and lovely public spaces like Hasenheide Park close by.More Information: homespace.website/bk9c-nopromoted

title: light quiet beautiful 4 room flat
description: We offer our 4 room apartment in Prenzlauer Berg for 130 € / night. It is situated between Kollwitzplatz and the Volkspark Friedrichshain. Details on the apartment: Situated on 4th floor of typical historical Berlin building - very light and quiet (no elevator) Wooden floors, with open kitchen area, bathroom with bathtub and washing machine Kitchen amenities: dishwasher, tea and coffee facilities, water heater, electric oven and gas stove, refrigerator, dishes and cutlery, pots and pans Sheets and towels provided Wireless DSL flat internet 3 bedrooms with double bed Open kitchen area Sleeping possibilities for up to 5 people Balcony Closest tramway station: Prenzlauer Allee or Greifswalder Str or Danziger Str./Winsstr Special note : we periodically house a cat  - not during rental periods (!)- so if you have allergies please let us know!

title: MODERN STUDIO APARTMENT WITH BALCONY FOR RENT IN SCHÖNEBERG, BERLIN
description: A charming studio apartment is available to rent in Schöneberg, Berlin. The property is modern and nicely furnished, and it has a separate bedroom and kitchen area. The bedroom has a double bed, a table with chairs, a TV, lots of storage space, and a gorgeous balcony. The bathroom has been recently renovated, and it has a beautiful shower with tile floors. The kitchen is new and has everything you might need, including a small electric stove, kitchen utensils and crockery, and a mini-fridge.  Schöneberg is a quiet, residential part of West Berlin. Well-connected by public transportation, this is an ideal neighborhood for anybody looking for affordable housing in a tranquil part of the big city.More Information: homespace.website/5vxa-nopromoted

title: A superb furnished studio apt is locates in center of Berlin
description: A superb furnished studio apt is locates in center of Berlin, The apt has recently been renovated to a very high standard and provide a good size living area with porcelain floors, modern fitted kitchen with appliances, LCD TV with satellite feed, built-in storage cupboard/wardrobes and a fully tiled walk in shower room with WC. The building provide exclusive washing/drying facilities along with CCTV.

title: Studio/Atelier space available !Invalidenstrasse Mitte from 01.02.2020
description: Studio space available in Mitte, From 01.02.20. 80€ per month, 80€ deposit. Studio space available in large studio complex, the room is roughly 18 squared meters .The room has no windows but is well lit, perfect for a photographer or similar. title: Studio Sharing / Nähatelier / Sewing Studio
description: Wir benutzen gerade unser Nähstudio sehr selten und würden dieses gerne zur Mitbenutzung zur Verfügung stellen. Wir sind ein kleines Team mit eigenem Label. Da wir letztes Jahr von Oberbekleidung zu Unterwäsche gewechselt haben brauchen wir unser Studio viel weniger als zuvor. Wir sind in der Weserstraße in Neukölln auf Höhe Fuldastraße. Im vorderen Zimmer teilen wir uns mit zwei kreativen ein Co-working und der hintere Raum ist Nähzimmer. Natürlich können ihr die Maschinen mitbenutzt werden. Bei weiteren Fragen könnt ihr mich gerne kontaktieren! Falls ihr zum Besichtigen vorbei schauen wollt, könnt ihr euch gerne bei mir dafür anmelden!  ------ We are renting some space in our sewing studio on Weserstraße/ corner of Fuldastraße. We did change our brand last year from normal clothes to underwear and thats why we are sitting more on our working desk than spending time on the sewing machine. That's why were thinking about the opportunity to rent one of the sewing place. In the front room there is a small co working with 2 other creatives. If you have more questions, let me know. If you want to see the space you can write me for an appointment to pass by!

title: Schreibtisch in der Weserstraße / Desk free in our Studio
description: Ein Schreibtisch in unserem kleinen Studio ist frei geworden. Wir sind ein kleines Team bestehend aus mir, Modedesignerin mit eigenem Label, meine Assistentin und Daniel einem Programmierer. Das Studio liegt auf der Weserstraße im Erdgeschoss auf der Höhe Fuldastraße und hat große Fenster, die man im Sommer auch komplett aufmachen kann. Gleich nebenan gibt es auch ein super nettes kleines Cafe. Bei Fragen oder Besichtigungswunsch könnt ihr mir gerne schreiben! PS: Preis ohne Mwst  ----- A place just got free in our little Studio on Weserstraße / corner Fuldastraße. We are a little Co Working consisting of me- a fashion designer, my assistant and Daniel a programmer. It is based on ground floor with big windows which you can open in summer completely. We also have a super nice cafe right next door. If you have any further questions or want to visit let me know! PS: The price is without taxes.

title: Very 1 Bedroom spacious apt bright and comfortable in Berlin
description: Very 1 Bedroom spacious apt bright and comfortable in Berlin, the perfect place for your stay in the city. Living area + double bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. title: Photographers Studio and Desk space available
description: Hi everyone, we have a photo studio and gallery space, that we share. We are 3 photographers and one desk-worker. Desk only is 180 per month. studio+desk is 280. All included, electricity, insurance, heating, internet and tax. On street level we have the studio, it's not very big but perfect for portraits, product shoots or small fashion shoots. Downstairs we have a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with shower. There's storage space too. Upstairs we have a separate room with a huge desk for 4 people. The studio is located opposite the Treptower Park, so it's always possible to move the shoot into the park. Also the Park Arcades, the shopping mall, is right there, with all kind of shops where you buy props or other stuff you may need spontaneous for the shoot. We provide a proper contract and you can always cancel within 2 months of notice. Starting 1st of february or whenever it may suit you. Right now we have 2 positions available. Desk only as well as desk+studio. WhatsAp to +49 174 690 960 3 or mail to  Kontaktinfo anzeigen  Best, Svenson

title: Stralauer Allee Apt with river view
description: Hi everyone,  I am a photo producer and travel often for work. I sublet my 2-rooms apartment for the period of between 2 months and 1 year, starting 1st of feb. 2020. The apartment is around 68 square meters and lays directly opposite the Elsen-Bridge in Friedrichshain. Next to the electro-club Salon zur Wilde Renate and the spacious Treptower Park, the Spree-island Stralau and the Rummelsburg bay. The S-Bahn station Treptower Park you can see from the balcony, it's a 4 minutes walk and the station Ostkreuz to the other side, is a quick 10 minutes walk. Beautiful place with high ceilings and big south-east windows facing and overlooking the Spree river and providing light and often bright sunlight all day long. my furniture is like in the attached pictures. Instead of a sofa I have a mattress and pillows on the floor of the licing room. The living room is big and the kitchen connects to the living room via old-style double doors. the bedroom lays towards the silent backyard of the building and a bath with shower and washing machine is there too. Warning: There is no internet/WiFi in my flat. I canceled it because it was always so shitty, that internet via my phone hotspot worked much faster. There's also the possibility to connect on a month-to-month tariff with a hotspot provided by German Telekom or if you decide to move in for a full year or longer, you can just make a contract with any provider you lik and choose; a router is still there. 2 supermarkets, Lidl and Netto, near by, a Späti shop and an ATM right downstairs. The rent, all bills included is 850,00 Euros per month, and I'll take a deposit of 300 Euros, just in case you run away with my keys. Otherwise, you'll get it back guaranteed. Smoking, please, only on the balcony. I know it's cold, but ....  Happy to get to know you, speak soon. Cheers, Svenson  Location: The apartment is around 65 square meters and lays directly opposite the Elsen-Bridge in Friedrichshain. Next to the club Wilde Renate and the Treptower Park, the Spree-island Stralau and the Rummelsburg bay. The S-Bahn station Treptower park you can see from the balcony and station Ostkreuz is a 10 minutes walk. Beautiful place with high ceilings and big south-east windows facing and overlooking the Spree river. Sonstiges  Non-smoking. ( ony on the balcony ) No pets. ( No, also not a very very small dog or a supercute cat ).

description: Really? Tell me more...  You will love the stylish setup here. It’s a chic apartment with all the basics and a generous kitchen and dining area. Round up the troops and get cooking. There’s no better way to make friends than with food.  We think this apartment is ideal for sociable types wanting to experience some of the best nightlife in Berlin. Kreuzberg is home to cool restaurants and even cooler bars. When you crave some peace and quiet head on over to the lovely Hasenheide Park.  Your top 3 reasons to rent here:  The bedrooms are modern and get plenty of natural light. The kitchen and dining area is the perfect spot to hang out with your new flatmates. Hasenheide Park is just a short stroll away. But you need to know this…  The apartment is located on the 3rd floor and there is no elevator – the perfect way to burn off those beer calories. You’ve got shops, restaurants, and U-bahn stops within easy reach.”  Help me make up my mind…  This is a modern 3rd floor, four-bedroom apartment on Kottbusser Damm, Berlin. title: Stylish & bright apartment in lively neighbourhood of Kreuzberg
description: Move in date can be flexible, but the sooner the better until 1 June or 1 July. Street name : Leuschnerdamm  Brand newly furnished and newly renovated 2-room 60m2 apartment with amazing views and very bright. It is also very quiet because the apartment has new triple! windows which block out the outside noise and keep the warmth in. There are big windows on both sides of the entire flat so the whole flat is VERY illuminated and bright. The view of one side of the apartment give to the majestic Engelbecken pool, where you find a family of 7 swans swimming around with their duck buddies. The view of the other side of the apartment gives to the garden and a children’s playground.  One of the best things about the flat is the amazing location! Right in the middle heart of Kreuzberg, it is surrounded by many bars, restaurants and busy nightlife. It is very well communicated, within walking distance you reach three different U-Bahn Stations (Kottbusser Tor, Moritzplatz and Heinrich Heine) and the big train station Ostbahnhof is also very close. The bus 147 stops right infont of the house. There are 2 supermarkets (Aldi and Edeka) that are not even 2 minutes walking distance. Lidl is at approx 5 minutes walking away.  The kitchen is fully furnished and also brand new and include microwave and oven, dishwasher and washing machine. The bedroom has a 160x200cm bed and a huge 2 meter long wardrobe. From the office room you can reach the balcony and catch some fresh air and enjoy the view to the pool.  Looking for a non-smoking, quiet (no parties in the flat!), responsible person or couple, with good communication, that can prove a stable income, no pets and most importantly, someone who will take good care of my place. When you apply, please write me about yourself and your situation.  Anmeldung/ registration to the flat is possible.

A total of five rooms including two bedrooms with walking closet, a salon, a dining room with open plan kitchen, office/guest room and two bathrooms- one with a rain shower and the second with a bath tub. All in in one- very exquisite. In the heart of one of Berlin-Mitte's most pulsating areas around Alexanderplatz. The property is located in one of the most attractive, convenient and sought-after parts of downtown Berlin. Everything from the Central Station to the Museum Island, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within minutes within walking distance. Many nice shops, cafes, clubs, restaurants are in the area, famous Hackescher Markt, Berlin Cathedral and Unter den Linden are just around the corner. S-Bahn Alexanderplatz, U-Bahn Weinmeisterstrasse and diverse busses and trams are all in walking distance. You can't live more central.  800 Euro monthly serious tenants only!

description: There are 3 rooms remaining in our new building.   Some are music production studio suites with isolation and high end acoustic treatment from Kiss Your Ears… https://www.kissyourears.com/ - designed for contemporary producers, mixing engineers, mastering engineers, etc. - those that need a good critical listening space complete with proper bass control.   Some are practise rooms for bands at the other side of the building…   We are currently hosting viewings to fill the last rooms. The email address to organise this below.  We build high quality dedicated music spaces and offer long term contracts with options to share a space and cut the rent in half. title: Cosy Room in Creative's Flat in Kreuzberg
description: Nicely furnished, cosy studio in the heart of Kreuzberg with comfortable boxspring bed. I am a Berlin born filmmaker and this is a LGBT+ friendly place.  This area of Berlin is central and packed with cafes, bars, famous nightclubs, music venues and beautiful parks and flea markets. And, of course, with some good cinemas and art galleries ( DAAD Gallery, Künstlerhaus Bethanien ) and bookshops and vinylshops..... The location is very close to public transportation. I have a little Chihuahua named Igor - I think this is important to know for people with allergic to dogs.  In the summertime you can smoke in the garden.  The room has 35 sqm. We share the bathroom ( shower). No kitchen use. Parties are not allowed; it's not a place for pubcrawlers. I am looking for a respectful person.  We look forward meeting follow creatives that want to spent an inspiring time in our vibrant neighbourhood Kreuzberg!

title: Freier Tisch im Coworking Neukölln
description: Freier Tisch im Coworking Neukölln  Wir haben in unserem gemütlichen Coworking immer noch ein paar Tische frei und würden uns über einen neuen Kollegen freuen!  Unter uns sind Regisseure, Kameramenschen, Grafiker, Programmer und Cutter. Hier wird schon fleißig geschrieben, dokumentiert, recherchiert, gegraded, geschnitten..zusammen arbeiten, sich kreativ austauschen, Filme gucken, Tischtennis spielen (Böhmischer Platz!:)  Wir haben einen ruhigen Hinterraum mit allen festen Tischen, einen Schnittraum/Color-Grading-Suite, eine kleine Bar/Küche und einen Filmprojektor in unserer Galerie. Wenn Du Interesse hast, schreib einfach kurz (oder ruf an) und komm vorbei. title: Exceptional 2 Bedroom Maisonette Rooftop Views
description: Exceptional in every way. This stunning and bright maisonette apartment on the 16th floor cannot be beaten with its view, hand picked designer interior combined with collectors items and vintage furniture decorated with love to detail but in a very modern and contemporary art of living. A total of five rooms including two bedrooms with walking closet, a salon, a dining room with open plan kitchen, office/guest room and two bathrooms- one with a rain shower and the second with a bath tub. All in in one- very exquisite. In the heart of one of Berlin-Mitte's most pulsating areas around Alexanderplatz. The property is located in one of the most attractive, convenient and sought-after parts of downtown Berlin. Everything from the Central Station to the Museum Island, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate and other important historical monuments can be reached within minutes within walking distance. Many nice shops, cafes, clubs, restaurants are in the area, famous Hackescher Markt, Berlin Cathedral and Unter den Linden are just around the corner. S-Bahn Alexanderplatz, U-Bahn Weinmeisterstrasse and diverse busses and trams are all in walking distance. You can't live more central.  800 Euro monthly serious tenants only!

Die Küche bietet 2 Kochfelder, Mikrowelle mit Backfunktion, Geschirrspülmaschine und Waschmaschine. Bad mit WC, Badewanne und Duschbrause. Küche und Flur haben Fenster nach Norden mit Blick Richtung Europacenter. Flurgarderobe und Schranknische im Flur der neu eingerichteten Wohnung zeigen den durchdachten Einrichtungsplan. Zum Apartment gehört ein Pkw‐Stellplatz auf dem abschließbaren Gelände im Innenhof. Der Blick geht Richtung Himmel, Amtsgericht und Rathaus Schöneberg.  Ab Januar 2020 wird diese möblierte Wohnung wegen Auslandsaufenthalt bis 2022 vermietet (ab 3 Monate bis 2 Jahre).

title: sTYLISH pRIVATE sTUDIO fOR rENT iN cOLIVING sPACE nEXT tO pOTSDAM uNIV
description: An amazing ensemble of modern, exquisitely designed buildings  Because you’re a student (or work at the university) – and you want to live with like-minded people in a cool urban-living space – just 1-minute from Potsdam University.  What's so cool about coliving?...  Coliving is a new concept in renting. Rather than live alone, you rent in a building with like-minded peers. It’s a bit like living in a student hall of residence because you share social spaces with your peers. But unlike a hall of residence, coliving spaces work to create happy individuals and healthy communities.  Living here, you get to meet new people from all over the world. People with different stories, original perspectives, and shared values. You'll make friends, learn surprising lessons, and love the experience. And you get everything you need in one place More Information: homespace.website/d88w-nopromoted

title: Beautiful, fully furnished 32m2 room in 200m2 apartment
description: Hello, apartment hunters! Available now! A beautiful and very large room (32m2) for rent in the heart of Kreuzberg (Wiener Str.) in a dream 200m2 flat with large kitchen and breakfast nook, living and dining room a large bathroom and guest toilet.  The room is tastefully furnished so you can move in as soon as you like. Bed, wardrobes, sofa, projector, desk, vanity... it's all there (see pics). You just need bring your personal belongings. The rent is 900 EUR and includes internet, electricity, heating, and all other amenities. There is a deposit to be paid upon moving in (1.5 times the rent = 1350 EUR). The room can be rented for short or long term but I would ask that you stay at least for 1 month. The room is available at least till the end of June 2020 but it is also possible to stay longer.   The apartment is located in the popular Wiener Str. in lively Kreuzberg. There are many bars, restaurants, cafes, and the full spectrum of nightlife Berlin has to offer within walking distance. Despite it being in the middle of everything, the flat is extremely quiet and peaceful as its windows all face to the courtyard. Goerlitzer Park is just across the street, there is a public swimming pool a stone’s throw away, and the beautiful Landwehrkanal is only 5 min walk away as well. A number of supermarkets are just around the corner (Penny, LPG, Lidl, Aldi, EDEKA). The U1 stop is just down the street and the M29 stops close to the house as well. It can’t get much more comfortable than that! With these connections you can get to Alexanderplatz, Hermannplatz and Warschauer Str. in no time at all.  You would share the flat with me. Given the size of the place, there is plenty of room for relaxed living. The flat is a clean and calm place. I am 33, an academic, love cooking, and enjoy a peaceful home with nice conversation. It would be lovely to sometimes eat together and enjoy a nice chat but you should be able to entertain yourself most of the time. ;)  For more info about the room/flat and more pictures, just get in touch! All the best, Angela

Originally a machine gallery and offices modeled after a doric temple, Now a creative hub of architects, artists, and other makers. North-facing balcony, but huge windows to north and south. Great summer breeze. warm winter light. Brand new kitchen with dish washer, fridge, stovetop. Brand new bathroom with washing machine. New wood floors upstairs, downstairs original wood floors restored. Building has elevator & parking; office is fully cleaned weekly. 5 mins to M5 & M8 tram stops; 35 mins to Hauptbahnhof. Next to Lidl, liquor store, drug store and Chilean cantina. View of sunset over Alexanderplatz. title: Gorgeous See Strasse Green parks 1bdrm apt for FEB-OCT
description: LOOKING FOR A SPECIAL SUBLET PERSON / I am offering the sublet  7/8 months to one year BUT YOU MUST READ WHOLE THING TO EXPLAIN !!  I am SUBLETTING  my space from february (or march) - october or ONE YEAR. with the possibility i may give the lease over the person/not sure…   I am in a very tricky situation in my life. I love my Berlin life… I do not want to leave and hopefully I can  save my space finding a GOOD, TRUSTING, DECENT QUIET FEMALE but right now, I have a family health emergency (which has been ongoing) and i have to be  away several months, maybe even a year… and i need someone  who will FIT IN here, hopefully speak german, and not bring too much attention to the fact i have to be away.  Someone who doesnt’ have furniture and someone who doesn’t have an issue with SHARING the space if i need to come back !!  570 a month for a one bedroom, huge 72 qm space in Wedding near SEE STRASSE UBAHN, centrally located.  small bathroom with shower, huge kitchen, and huge living room. There are 2 balconies.  The apt is stunning, everyone loves the decor (antiques) You hear the birds in the morning, and if you want to start a garden on the balcony the landlord would love you!  The person who comes in here has to be easy to communicate with, respectful  of other people, CONSCIOUS, aware, and awake please and WORKING!!  This building is OLD SCHOOL, i.e. people live here for over 20 years, they don’t care as long as there is quiet, and respect for each other’s lives, so no coming in at 3 am, slamming doors etc.   Someone who enjoys the space as a sanctuary to come home to, to write, but  no parties. There are so many amazing YOGA spaces round here.  There are green parks here and wonderful walking and Plotzensee is down the road.  This area is NOT highly gentrified and still has a cool  old school german vibe to it.  Speaking German would be highly needed!!  So the ROOMMATE situation occurs MAY BE in jUNE / JULY when i have to come back for a few days or weeks.  I am not sure.  Because of the HEALTH issue I have to go day by day with my family situation!!  I DO NOT KNOW.  You could end up having the space for one year for yourself… but i know i have to come back june or july just to show myself…. so for a few days. But if things calm down in NY I may return for a few months so you have to be ok to share with me.  I’m a quiet, gay writer,  i usually work nIGHTS, so it would help for the person to work 9-5 so each would have the space to themselves…. the rent would go down to 380 a month…   I’m an older, but still funky dude girl writer!  I like my space to think and write, but I’m also super social and would love to share this space with a curious, but NO DRAMA person who likes her space too, but also likes to hang out with a coffee and chat  here and there….. Again, I repeat, there is a GOOD chance you could have this space for the whole time period on your own!!  Please email me a bit about yourself… i’ll email photos!! And please please send me your NORMAL email (i always have some issues with the emails) PLEASE PLEASE GET IN TOUCH RIGHT AWAY… i’m trying to get this sorted asap.. so as not to get stuck!! My place is now sublet til Feb 1  thanks and blessings and lets believe in miracles.. cause i sure need one now!

title: Hochwertige und voll möblierte Mietwohnung!!
description: Massiv errichtet, modernes Design, praktische Grundrisse, eine einzigartige Lage, ein begrünter Innenhof, ein Fitnessraum für alle Bewohner - das und noch Vieles mehr finden Sie in unserem Objekt. Neben Holzfenstern mit elektrischen Sonnenrollos, finden Sie einen praktischen Grundriss, der offen gestaltet ist. Beheizt wird das Objekt mittels Fernwärme über eine Fußbodenheizung.  Ausstattung  Ihre neue Wohnung verfügt über einen Abstellraum, ein Wohnzimmer, 2 Schlafzimmer, eine offene Küche, ein Badezimmer und einen Balkon. Die offen gestaltete Küche inkl. hochwertiger Einbauküche verfügt über sämtliche elektrische Geräte und Geschirr. Es befindet sich alles in einem tadellosen Zustand. Der Wohn- und Essbereich ist sehr hell und versprüht ein Gefühl von Großzügigkeit. Direkt an das Wohnzimmer schließt sich das Schlafzimmer an. Ein großes Bett und einen passgenauen Kleiderschrank finden Sie bereits vor. Das innenliegende Badezimmer ist modern und hell gestaltet. Es verfügt über eine Dusche, ein wandhängendes WC, einen Strukturheizkörper und ein Waschbecken. Auch befindet sich hier die Waschmaschine. Die Wohnung ist vollständig möbliert, sämtliche Möbel sind Bestandteil der Vermietung. Auch TV, Strom und Internet ist bereits enthalten. Sie brauchen nur noch einziehen!

title: Sunset Skyline in Neukölln | 16sqm for 555 Euro per month
description: Sunset Skyline in Neukölln | 16sqm for 555 Euro per month  Well-lit, FURNiSHED room available in a flat share from 1st January 2020 until 30st April 2020. Maybe longer. The room measures 16 sqm and has a laminate floor, a bed 1,6x2 meters, a table, 2 chairs, cupboards, retro lights, ...  You can enjoy the sunset skyline of Berlin in the evenings through your window lying on your bed :)  The apartment is located on the attic floor of a refurbished old building in excellent condition. It comes with central heating and central warm water supply. The total of 95 sqm divide into 3 bedrooms rooms, a kitchen, a bathroom and a hallway. Your rooms come with big window facing west. The bathroom is equipped with a bathtub (shower in the morning sun:) , a huge mirror and a washing machine. A fast internet connection is available through WiFi and Lan. There's no TV!  You´ll be sharing the apartment with a 42 years old freelancer (+1) who is creating media and works as gardener, too. You should be self responsible, relaxed and maintain a respectful way of living together.  The house is located in south-east of Berlin in a district called Neukoelln. The area has become popular amongst young people, students and alternative minds during the last few years and hosts quite a lot near bars. Prices are modest, the atmosphere often still low-key but in enhances :) and very friendly. Public transport connection is pretty good as there are busses running just down the street to Herrmannplatz where you have access to the subway lines U7 and U8. Also reachable within 10 minutes by foot is train station Sonnenallee where the circle lines S41 and S42 are running. Getting to city center takes around 20 - 25 minutes.  Google Maps link: https://www.google.de/maps/place/Treptower+Str.+23,+12059+Berlin/@52.4805666,13.4495321,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x47a84f09ad502b89:0x986aa9d177f688f6!8m2!3d52.4805634!4d13.4517261  The monthly rent is 555,00 everything included. A deposit of one month's rent is due at moving in.  If you are interested or have any questions, simply give me an Email: Kontaktinfo anzeigen   Cheers Firas

description: Superb and highly desirable location of Nansenstrasse at the border of Kreuzberg & Neukölln. Extensively refurbished in 2015, this spacious and light-filled 65 sqm, 2 room apartment is situated on the first floor and in the back courtyard of a classic “altbau” apartment block.   The Apartment is very quiet but still only a moment’s walk from the amenities and cafés, restaurants and bars of Maybachufer, Paul-Lincke-Ufer, Weserstrasse and beyond. It is a short walk, or bike ride, to the open green spaces of Görlitzer Park and Templehof.   The flat is offered fully furnished with well maintained furniture:  – Fully fitted kitchen with Induction Hob, Oven, Fridge, Dishwasher and Washing Machine.  – All cutlery, crockery and kitchenware is supplied. – Large Double Bed (160cm) with large wardrobe and double chest of drawers, bedside tables and full-length mirror. – Bathroom with bath/shower. – Living room with widescreen HDTV, Bluray player and a selection of vintage and modern furniture.  – Gas fired central heating with own boiler and thermostat. – Double glazing throughout – Easy on-street parking and secure parking for bicycles in rear courtyard. – Shared secure basement space.  – Great Public transport links: U8 Schönleinstraße, U7/U8 Hermannplatz and multiple bus routes  AVAILABLE Now €1295 per month including water, gas, electricity and high-speed internet

title: Fabulous 75sqm 3 room entire apartment, 50 mins from Berlin
description: This 75 square metre (246 square feet) 3 room apartment is in the beautiful village of Märkisch Buchholz, gateway to the Spreewald region of Brandenburg, and 50 mins by car or 38 mins by train to the centre of Berlin. This is closer than a lot of far more expensive Berlin suburbs-and much, much cosier. Lakes galore, forests, rivers, bike tracks-a holiday paradise. Fully furnished, TV, stereo, washing machine, fully equipped kitchen, it´s all here-except the dishwasher. We´re subletting from January the 6th 2020 to May the 10th and are looking for someone for the entire period-sorry, no offers of less than four months. The €800 per month rent includes electricity and heating. Oh, and a not-quite-finished 20 square metre  deck...und jetzt auf  Deutsch...  ...Sehr schöne möblierte 3 Zimmer Wohnung, 75 qm, in Märkisch  Buchholz, das „Tor zum Spreewald“ von Januar bis Mai 2020 zu vermieten. Märkisch Buchholz ist die kleinste und älteste Stadt Brandenburgs, es ist 4 km von Halbe entfernt von wo aus stündlich ein Zug in 38 Minuten  nach Berlin Ostkreuz fährt. Hier gibt es viel Wald, Fahrradwege, Flüsse und Seen, obwohl die Wohnung direkt am Marktplatz liegt ist es sehr ruhig. Im Ort gibt es eine Straußenfarm und in den umliegenden Orten eine Whiskeybrennerei, die Gläserne Molkerei und  frisches Wild.  Sobald es Frühling wird macht nebenan „Herrmann´s Marktwirtschaft“ wieder auf, ein wunderschöner mediterraner Biergarten mit Holzofenpizza und besten Burgern, eine echte Oase. Die Miete von 800,- € monatlich beinhaltet Strom, Heizung, Wasser und W-Lan. Zur Ausstattung gehören: Badezimmer: Badewanne mit Duschvorhang, Toilette, Waschbecken Küche: Waschmaschine, Herd mit Ofen und vier Kochplatten, zwei Kühlschränke und sämtliche Küchengeräte Schlafzimmer: ein großes Doppelbett, Kleiderschrank Wohnzimmer: schöner großer ausziehbarer Holztisch, großer Fernsehbildschirm, Sofa Arbeitszimmer: zwei Schreibtische, Nähmaschine, Kleiderschrank, ein Doppel-Futon dient als zweite Schlafgelegenheit. Eine 20 qm Terrasse ist in Arbeit kann aber schon zum Sitzen genutzt werden. Der große Garten hinter dem Haus kann auch mit genutzt werden. In der gesamten Wohnung hängt viel Kunst. Wir wünschen uns nette Leute die unseren Pflanzen ab und zu mal einen Schluck  Wasser geben, auf gute Nachbarschaft wert legen und die Schönheit der Natur zu schätzen wissen.

title: Bock auf Neukölln? // Feeling fancy for Neukölln?
description: Hallo Leute!  ---BEI UNS IST AB DEM 01.01.2020 EIN ZIMMER FREI! --  WIR: Sind eine 4er WG im schönen Neuköln. Gerade sind wir noch drei Jungs aber wir würden es in Zukunft gern bunt halten - wir gehen also locker an die Sache und sind gespannt wer sich meldet, egal, ob du männlich oder weiblich bist. Wir sprechen übrigens Deutsch und Englisch.  WIR: Wohnen zwischen Weserstraße und Kanal. Es gibt viele Bars und Clubs in der Gegend, genauso wie Grünflächen und auch gute Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind zahlreich vertreten. Zur nächsten S-Bahnstation ist es nicht weit (Ringbahn), ebenso wie zur U-Bahn und der Bus hält um die Ecke.  WIR: Haben eine gut ausgestattete Küche mit Kühlschrank, Herd etc. und ein Duschbad. Natürlich könntest du all das mitbenutzen. Unsere Wohnung befindet sich in einem Neubau, der allerdings saniert ist. Einen Fahrstuhl gibt es auch, ganz praktisch für den Umzug.  DICH: Erwartet ein 25 qm großes Zimmer - Ab dem 01.01.20! Die Warmmiete beträgt 455, deine Kaution zur Sicherheit 555€. Das Zimmer ist unmöbliert, du kannst es dir also ganz so einrichten, wie du magst.  DU: Solltest einfach nur gut zu uns passen - alles andere ist nicht so wichtig. Deswegen wäre es schön, wenn du uns ein paar Zeilen zu dir schreiben könntest. Außerdem solltest du MONTAGS UND FREITAGS VON 18-19 Uhr Zeit haben. Da haben wir nämlich JEDE WOCHE eine offene Besichtigung. Schreib uns doch einfach eine kurze Nachricht, wenn wir dein Interesse geweckt haben.  Liebe Grüße! - Hey there!  ---ONE ROOM IN OUR SHARED FLAT IS AVAILABLE STARTING ON THE 01.01.2020!---  WE: Are a big 4 person shared flat. Right now we are 3 boys but we would enjoy to mix things up in the future as well. So we are looking for a male or female to join us. We speak German and English.  WE: Live between the Weserstraße and the canal. There are a lot of clubs and bars in walking distance, but also a mall and some nice parks. It's close to the Ringbahn and underground, the bus is even closer.  WE: Live in a newer charming building. We have a well equipped kitchen with a fridge, stove, sink etc. and a bathroom with a shower. Of course you could use all of this. We're living on the second floor but we've got a elevator which is very practical for moving.  YOU: Could live in a 25 sm big room - starting on the 01.01.2020! The rent is 455, the safety deposit is 555€. The room is unfurnished, so you can decorate it just the way that you want.  YOU: Should just fit us - the rest is not that important. Because of this it would be nice if you could tell us a little bit about you in your message. And you should have some spare time on MONDAYS OR FRIDAYS FROM 6 TO 7 PM. These are the dates of our viewings until we've found a new flatmate. Just write us if you're interested!  Best Regards!

title: sTYLISH rOOM fOR rENT iN fOUR-bEDROOM aPARTMENT, sTEGLITZ-zEHLENDORF
description: Really? Tell me more...  You will love the setup here. It’s a modern apartment with all the basics and a generous kitchen and cute dining area. Round up the troops and get cooking. There’s no better way to make friends than with food.  We think this apartment is ideal for sociable individuals looking for a location to match their lifestyle. Steglitz-Zehlendorf is a lovely tree lined residential area, surrounded by public parks, and there are a few good restaurants close by too.  Your top 3 reasons to rent here:  The bedrooms are fashionably furnished. The modern kitchen. What’s your specialty? Marienpark and brewery is just a short stroll away. But you need to know this…  The apartment is located quite far from the city centre – ideal if you have a car or just want to explore a lesser-known part of Berlin Your Home-checker, Ganna, said:  “I loved this property. It’s a brand new apartment in a nice residential location. You've got parks, shops and a U-bahn station close by.”  Help me make up my mind…  This is a modern 2nd floor, four-bedroom apartment on Kaiserstraße, Berlin. It boasts fashionably furnished bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and it has a communal dining area.  This property is ideal for sociable individuals. You’ll be in a largely residential neighborhood, with shops, restaurants, and beautiful public parks like Marienpark close by.More Information: homespace.website/tdjw-nopromoted

title: VACATION ROOM FOR RENT
description: Bright apartment situated in the heart of the center , with a wide balcony! Bright living room with open kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, separate toilet, balcony. Neat entrance , double glazed windows, spotlights and panel doors. The modern kitchen is located at the rear and has several appliances; a five-burner gas hob, hood, oven, refrigerator and dishwasher, the sink is made of white stone and composite lot of cupboard space. There is also a washer / dryer installed under the worktop. The bedroom at the rear has patio doors to the balcony and there is a built-in wardrobe. The bathroom is equipped with a rain shower, radiator and sink. The separate toilet is in the same style. title: Fully furnished 2 room apartment in Kreuzberg for sublet
description: Hi there,   I'm travelling 3 months and looking to rent my flat out to a responsible single professional or couple.   Available around 15th of January until April 1st.  The flat is in a beautiful Berlin altbau building in wonderful Gräfekiez on Müllenhoffstr. with a living room, seperate modern kitchen, large bathroom and a bedroom. Two small balconies. There is another half room for stuff. I wouldn't rent out this room, because I put in my stuff, but feel free to use it for hang out the laundry. The apartment is renovated so it feels light and cozy.  72 living space (2,5 rooms+balconies)  Rent:  €999 / calendar month +operating costs (Wifi, power...)  Feel free to get in touch for further details and to organise a visit

title: Outstanding and unobstructed view
description: Nicely furnished, newly renovated 80m, one bedroom apt.on the 2nd floor(with lift) in the City Centre. It is very bright, and spacious, and has a front view of the Westerkerk, and back view of gardens. We have one flat screen tv, WI-FI and a copier/printer. There is also a washing machine, and dryer. The bathroom has a tub, and there is a separate toilet. There is a wood burning fireplace, and wooden floors throughout the apartment. The kitchen has new appliances and a dishwasher. There is also a washer and dryer.A long hallway separates the bedroom and living room. Both rooms have doors so there is lots of privacy, the apartment is very comfortable.The street has a supermarket, and several cafes. There are three tram lines, and several buses in front of the door. It is a wonderfully convenient area in the heart of the historic district. It is a great apartment for someone doing business in Berlin or for tourists who want to be in the center. The tram in front of the house goes to Central Station, and it is a twenty minute ride to the airport.

End you day by walking to local cafès and restaurants and enjoy the taste of traditional Portuguese cuisine. Only 55€ per Nigth.  for more info email
